Madison felt she understood where Kyle was coming rom – he’d just followed Ralph and Beth’s lead. But what about Beth? How had she gotten involved with the grant program, and why?

She decided to talk with Beth directly – asking her to join Madison for lunch in the Power’s dining l. Beth readily accepted, and over a lunch of lasagna and salad the two co-eds addressed Madison’s concerns as Beth related her tale.

Beth told Madison that she knew her life was changing and moving in a new direction soon after the end of the summer of her junior year in high school. This was even before her parents wrangled a scholarship for her to come to Powers. Beth was part of a family where her parents and siblings were all larger, and no one cared. Beth ate just as heartily as any of them, but never matched their size.

No one in the family made a big deal about this. Everyone, including Beth, realized that she was probably the most physically active person in the family – walking three miles round trip to school most days, being part of the volleyball and swim teams, and working out regularly. She commonly had a hearty 1000+ calorie breakfast of pancakes, French toast or a burrito along with a pizza or burger with fries and soda for lunch, all worth another 1000 calories. Then came family style super in the evening, usually with dessert. With all this, regularly around 3000 calories a day, her weight stayed a svelte 120 or so on her 5’ 7” frame – until the beginning of her senior year.

That’s when things began to change for Beth. On her 18th birthday her parents presented her with keys to her own car – a recognition of her excellent grades. This eliminated her daily three mile walk while getting her home earlier, The latter frequently meant a snack to tide her over until supper here hours later. That same year both a scheduling conflict and being elected to the student council caused her to drop off the swim team and cut back on her workouts.

The results were subtle but predictable. Formerly svelte Beth began to have a more rounded midriff and fuller thighs, but didn’t really notice the change until some of her size 4 clothes began to feel snug. She knew herself to have been borderline underweight and that her classmates were wearing size 6 and 8 clothes so her new growth didn’t bother her much. Neither did it disturb her mom - who made sure to take advantage of the after-holiday sales to give Beth a wardrobe of size 6 and 8 clothing.

And so Beth continued to serve on the student council, along the way each week enjoying 2-3 of the donuts and other pastries which were readily available. With wheels of her own she also partied more – and never turned down a date when food was involved. Evening snacks while studying become frequent as well. Caloric intake soared some days to 4000. By May she was able to fit comfortably into a size 8 prom dress, but her weight was 145 – a gain of 25 pounds in one school year.

Fortunately none of this particularly distressed Beth. Her family was larger, she was maturing and getting less exercise; the fact that she’d gained 2 dress sizes didn’t bother her. Privately she wondered why her body hadn’t done this before.

She decided to experiment with dieting. In her high school nutrition class she had learned that a hyperglycemic index breakfast of 265 calories of whole grains and protein combined with exercise and no more than 1200 more calories the rest of the day should produce weight loss. For two weeks she tried it, then abruptly decided “OK, this isn’t for me.”

She went to her mom, a pleasant 230 pound fulltime homebodyand said, “OK, your right – I belong in Powers.’

Her mom, a Powers graduate and member of UMILA, smiled. Beth’s sister Helen had graduated the year before and was now both employed and engaged. She was happy to help facilitate the grant. When her parents saw her off to school she had a rather loose fitting size 10 wardrobe in her suitcases,

“Egg whites and quinoa aren’t what she’ll find at Powers,” Beth’s mom observed,

“Nope,” acknowledged her dad with a smile, giving his wife a loving squeeze. “Beth will blossom into the double digits – and hopefully be just as beautiful and happy with herself as you are,”

Beth did not disappoint – and by the next holiday season had added nearly another 20 pounds as well as getting to know Ralph. This was sufficient to became recipient of a UMILA grant,

Luckily this transformation Beth took in stride. Her thighs continued to fill in, her belly grew softer and her derriere larger. When seated her belly roll formed a muffin top over her waistband. Her breasts were full and her arms acquired a fresh roundness as did her chin and cheeks.

Beth shared all of this, concluding to Madison, “I’m a BBW by heredity and content in my role. I have Ralph, Mom has Dad, my sister has Bob and we’re all in good health.

“You’re acting as if there was an inner fat girl palying athlete in high school,” observed Madison.

“Nothing that systematic,” answered Beth. “To be skinny for someone like me is like living the life of an ascetic. I tried t and decided I’m just happier living in the fat lane. And that’s OK just as those who want to live on lentils can if they wish. Fortunately there are people like Kyle and Ralph.”

“Yes,” agreed Madison, “thankfully there are.”

Madison was now more at ease over what was happening. Beth and Ralph obviously were just friends trying to help. But Madison knew that the next day she and Kyle would be picking up the bike – and then what? Would her parents be as accepting of her as those of Cassi and Beth?

Pulling her waistband back up, she exited the plane.

After going through baggage, she exited to see her Mom's luxury SUV parked and waiting. When she jumped in, the response was about what she had expected.

"My god Madison?! What the hell happened?" Her Mom said, half angry half astonished.

"I don't know, Mom." She said, wanting to cry, "It just kind of happened."

"No. 5 pounds happens, you must have gained a ton! Look at that!" She said, giving her daughter a pat on her belly, and continued, "we never should have had you go to a Midwestern school."

She was left lying awake in bed, staring up at the ceiling in the dark. She was still bloated from breakfast, dinner and lunch...how the hell could she still be hungry? She sat up and rubbed her stomach. "Seriously?" She asked, directing the question to her bare belly as though it would respond. Then again, perhaps eating a little something wasn't such a bad idea; it was food that had tired her out earlier, maybe a midnight snack would get her back to sleep again?

Groggily, Madison swung her legs out of bed and got to her feet. She was wearing only her underwear, a form fitting black bra and panties that accentuated her breasts and butt, which had grown a little larger lately. She didn't bother slipping into anything else, figuring nobody would see her at this hour. Quietly, she opened her bedroom door and peeked her head out into the dark corridor; the coast was clear. She slipped into the corridor with dainty steps and slowly made her way downstairs, which, thankfully, was also clear.

Madison crept into the kitchen and headed straight for the fridge. With all the food Cassi's Mom had been supplying over the last two days, there was bound to be some leftovers. When she pulled open the fridge door, illuminating the dark kitchen, her suspicions were confirmed - there was huge platters of meat, vegetables, cheese and all sorts of farm produce just sitting there right in front of her...but what really caught Madison's eye was the huge chocolate cake...untouched...rich...delicious. Surely nobody would notice one slice was missing?

Without thinking, Madison took the huge cake out of the fridge and laid it down on the table. She stumbled in the dark, but refused to turn the lights on in case it attracted attention. She grabbed a knife, and, not bothering with a plate, cut herself an ample slice of cake. It was amazing, as she had expected, and she devoured it in three huge bites. She glanced down at the cake again, and was about to put it back in the fridge...when she found herself reaching for another slice. I'm sure nobody will mind...she told herself, as she cut an even larger slice than before.

But it didn't stop there. The cake was so delicious, so creamy, so rich...she had to have more. Two, then three, then four slices just weren't enough, and every time she finished one portion, she immediately went for another. Only when she found herself reaching for an empty plate did Madison realize what she had done...the cake was gone. She couldn't remember eating it all, but somehow she had managed it. The plate was bare, and when she looked down at her stomach, it was so round and full that she looked like she might burst at any moment.

"Oh my God..." Madison gasped as she rubbed her bulging belly in amazement. "What have I done?"

She stood up hurriedly, but was nearly dragged down by the weight of her stomach. "URRRRRRRRP!" Madison belched noisily as she scrambled to cover up the remains of her feast. She grabbed the plate and brushed the crumbs into the trash frantically...how the hell was she going to explain this? Perhaps they would be too polite to blame her? Her mind was racing. She wiped the crumbs from her mouth and opened the fridge again, shoving the empty cake plate underneath one of the larger dishes, hoping nobody would notice it.

She was about to shut the fridge door when her eyes drifted to the large pitcher of milk in the door...and she suddenly realized she was thirsty. Surely nobody would mind her having a drink? She took the pitcher and placed it to her lips as she began to chug the creamy milk. Like everything else in this house, it tasted amazing, and she continued to chug it down greedily. Her stomach bloated even larger as she swallowed a good pintful of the stuff before finally placing it back in the fridge.

"And if you would direct your attention out the left of the aircraft, ladies and gentlemen, you will now be able to see your destination, the beautiful island of Aruba." Flamboyant house music pounded on the dance floor below, but it was nice and quiet up on the rooftop patio. Cassi was feeling a bit tipsy and had decided to withdraw from the sweaty fray downstairs for the respite of the pleasantly cool night air, and maybe just one cigarette

Reflextions was the hottest club in the downtown district. The trio had been there for several hours now, enjoying their first night on the island. Madison had arranged for a table with bottle service and the whole bit, all on daddy's card, of course, but the dollar does stretch further down there. By hour one, Madison had drunk her two friends absolutely under the table. She ate nachos and polished off her fourth margarita, while Greg was practically hammered off three shots of watered down tequila, and Cassi nursed her third Corona as she chatted up a cute, young, and Costa-Rican gentleman.

Greg was out of his head, making a fool of himself with his ape-like dancing, when his drunken robot brain told him to go to the rooftop. Stumbling up the rather steep stairs, He was happy to see Cassi in silhouette against the brightly lit street. God, she looked awesome, he thought, her trim form complimented by a tight, bright blue cocktail dress. It was sexily short, but not enough that it spoiled the surprise of her perky butt.

Cassi sensed a presence behind her and it smelled of liquor and sweat. Turning around, she wasn't surprised to find Greg, his towheaded countenance pinkish from a day in the equatorial sun. "Where's Madison?" she asked. "Oh, you means the cow?" Greg slurred. "She's probably wandered off to get a fucking tacos, or something." Cassi was offended by Greg's brazen remark, and responded in a biting tone. "You're drunk, Greg! Watch your mouth. Maybe its time we all left, come on!" Her words flew right over Greg's head, as he leaned into Cassi, reaching around her slim waist for her supple rear, hand just making contact before he felt a rapid smack across his glassy-eyed face. To him this was simply a further invitation. Next thing, he lunged forward, wrapping his hands around a reeling Cassi, while attempting to place a wet kiss on her neck. He figured this would really turn her on.

"Oh, there you guys are! Wait? What the fuck Greg? Cassi, you whore!" Greg and Cassi froze in their awkward embrace upon hearing the familiar voice. Cassi took the opportunity of the diversion to push the drunken fool off of her, but by the time she turned to the doorway, Madison was already gone.

123.content:
Madison was eagerly awaiting the following evening as she studied on a Thursday night heading into a weekend in the spring of her junior year. Not only was it another weekend in which the social queen of Powers U would be able to hit the town with her and her sorority friends, but it also happened to be her 21st birthday, and after what had felt like forever, she would finally be legally able to drink.

This wasn't to say that Madison had not been drinking before, with a deep list of friends, she was always just one call away from procuring some Vodka for her and her sisters to drink in the sorority house. However, she could now go out to bars with the upperclassmen, something she was never able to pull off after the police started cracking down harder on the fake IDs that were previously used.

Madison's late birthday had been of great annoyance to her. Her other best friends in the sorority had already been 21 for months, and although they often stayed in to hang out with her, she felt somewhat left behind. There was Cassi, her friend since the first day of school two years ago, when they were freshman roommates. Despite their differing backgrounds, they became best friends, and roomed together in the house. Cassi was slightly shorter than Madison, and had blonde hair, and was slightly shorter than Madison, and was pretty skinny, coming in at 5'5 120 pounds.

As Madison glanced away from the notes on her desk, she looked at a photo of her and Cassi, and their other two close friends in the sorority, all of them looking stunning. There was Kelsey, who was 5'6 125, and Asian, with black hair, who had only turned 21 two weeks prior and had already made Madison quite jealous, with her trips to the bars, and Anna, who was 5'9, brunette and weighed 130.

Madison had not really gotten to know Anna until they each took a calc class together sophomore year. Despite her usual academic prowess, Madison found herself struggling, and Anna, who she sat next to, offered to do study sessions with her, raising her grade in the class to a level that Madison was okay with.

After a few additional hours of studying, Madison went to bed, as she lay there, waiting to fall asleep, she thought about the success of her first two and a half years of school, academically, and socially, and heck, even physically. Even though some girls had gained a bit of weight, or in rare instances, ballooned up, Madison with her strict self control, had not gained a pound. If she ever was going to drink at the house, she was sure to limit what she ate throughout the day, thus keeping her from throwing off her diet, that kept her weight at 5'7 130.

Madison could not believe it was finally here. She was finally 21, and could partake in what she considered to be the last 'adult' milestone, drinking at bars. Dressed in their trendy outfits, the group; Madison, Cassi, Anna, and Kelsey went down to the warehouse district near campus, the Powers entertainment district. Given the close proximity of the campus to downtown, they were able to walk, which was a good thing, because by the time 9:30 rolled around, they were already quite lit.

Madison had led the way, with her lower tolerance, and excessive birthday drinking. She had already consumed 4, or was it 5? beers beforehand, and a few vodka cranberrys in the sorority house with the others while they pregamed. As they got to the bar, there were no shortage of guys who were willing to congratulate Madison on her 21st with a drink, and the opportunity to chat her up. As more and more drinks came, Madison lost her remaining competence and Cassi took the role of making sure Madison wasn't going to fall into any trouble.

This was not to say the others were not drinking as well. Anna, one who was always down for a good time, had gotten very drunk, but was overshadowed by Madison on this rare occasion. Her reasons were different. Yes, she was out to have a good time, but it was also because she wanted to run into a guy, Aaron, and be loose enough to just talk to him, without any nervousness. It was not typical for her to have this kind of trouble, but he was special, she thought, so she wanted to make sure it worked.

Kelsey mainly worked around the bar, running into people she knew, and drinking with most of them as the night progressed. It was a clinic in drinking for the girls, yet not out of the ordinary from any other college campus on a nice spring evening. This was how they partied at Powers, and Madison was happy to be a participant.

Another 4 weekends had gone by, and Madison glanced at her calendar while getting ready for another night of partying. Hmm, 4 weeks until the end of the year she thought to herself as she looked for what to wear. That should leave us, one, maybe two more weekends until everyone shuts down for studying she thought, before moving on to try to find something that she could wear during the heat wave that was hitting the region.

The previous 4 weekends were something of a blur for Madison. During the week (save for nights after chapter, or the occasional Thursday) she had been studying, and keeping up with her assignments and notes. However, the weekends were another story. Madison, Anna, Kelsey, and Cassi had been going out--and going hard twice every weekend. Madison was having a blast. She had slept with a few guys that she wanted to throughout this period, and was continuing the social climb that had began when she stepped on campus. As she put on her underwear, she thought to herself, what could be in store for her. Sorority executive board? Please she thought, that was a given. Class President? Too time consuming. Sorority President? Now that's something to aspire to. It was the perfect fit for Madison. Something to show off her total package of looks, smarts, and social achievements. Next fall is when it will all come together, she thought as she grabbed a skirt and pulled it on.

Suddenly, Madison noticed that it felt a bit tight. It was going to button, without much effort. But still, the skirt used to be, well, a bit looser. As she looked at her still shirtless body in the mirror, she noticed that she hard washboard abs in the mirror she noticed that they looked just a bit softer. Not even the precursor to a gut was there, but still, We'll have to watch out for that. For Madison, it was only a casual thought. Nothing to be alarmed by. She was still working out, and plus, when summer came, she planned to have everything cool down a bit.

Down the hall of the sorority house, Anna had already gotten ready and poured herself a gin and tonic while browsing through Facebook. Soooo many photos have been uploaded this month she thought, while browsing through the ones from last weekend. Man, do we look good. However, as she got to a few of them, she wondered about the angle of a few photos. Is that the outline of my belly? Anna looked in closer. It wasn't so much pressing up against her shirt in front as on the sides, but it looked like she had small love handles. Five pounds max, she thought to herself.

That night while pregaming, they discussed their summer plans. Kelsey seemed to have the most exciting ones.

"Sooo, are you excited for Houston?" Cassi asked Anna.

"Yes, it's going to be such hard work, but it could be a once in a lifetime opportunity." Anna responded. She had gotten an amazing internship further south in Houston at one of the top oil companies. Anna always seemed like the odd one out, with her petroleum engineering major, chosen to put her intellect to the test quite quickly, in one of the most lucrative fields. If her work was deemed of high enough quality, and her grades senior year held, she could have a job that paid over $250,000 per year out of college, the reward for years of hard work. However, this meant that she would be gone for the summer, and wanted to get every last night in that she could.

"Madison, did you get your internship?" Anna asked.

"Yes, I'll be working downtown in the 31st street office of HDK." She responded, quite pleased. HDK was a well known investment firm that was located in Powers. Although her parents were rather torn up about it, Madison decided to try to get a summer internship in Powers, as opposed to back home in Miami. Yes, Miami would have been more fun, but she thought she should focus on creating a network in Powers, and this was certainly a good first step.

"Lucky, I'm back at the SAT prep course," Kelsey chimmed in.

"Yeah, but you'll be out earning all of us," Madison replied, trying to remind Kelsey of that.

"For now." She said. Kelsey did not completely know what she wanted to do after school, Madison assumed it would be law school, or maybe an MBA, get a academic track PHD?. Never-mind, thought Madison, Kelsey has no idea what she wants to do next year. She'll probably be content just working out the whole summer, it's all she seems to do now.

Cassi sat there silently. She knew that her accomplishments were not going to look as great in comparison. She was bar-tending over the summer. She knew it was going to be as good of money as Kelsey was making, she could stay in town, plus, it was fun, so she thought it was a good way to kill a few months, however, it seemed much less door opening to her, something her friends seemed to care very deeply about.

Most of these girls had grand plans for the future, yet they were half an hour away from being extremely college, and they finished their drinks and got ready for another night on the town.

123111.content:
It was Thursday, and Madison had just finished her last final of her junior year and walked up into the top level of the sorority house where Anna's room was. On her way to her room, she walked past a still studying Anna.

"Looks like you drew the crap finals schedule this year." Madison said to Anna from the hallway. Turning around, Anna responded, "It always seems to break this way. The last two years I've had at least one Friday final. I'm going to be sooo happy when it's over."

"Too bad, some of us are going out tonight." Madison replied.

"That's not a shock" Anna said. She knew first hand that all of them had been constantly frequenting the bars and partying, and her bank account was a testament to that. From an extremely middle class family, Anna at times felt out of place amongst her girlfriends in the sorority, and Madison, Cassi, and Kelsey in particular.

She had already gone to Cassi's parent's farm once, and saw that although the family didn't control an agribusiness empire, they were clearly doing well. She had met Kelsey's Dad, Dr. Jeon, a surgeon. Then, from spring break her sophomore year, she remembered her awe as she stepped into Madison's house and saw how nice everything looked, and it's proximity to the beach. These girls were all of varying levels of privilege, but higher than her's. Perhaps that was why she was the only one who got queezy when she opened her credit card bill a few weeks ago. I know we were spending a lot, but not this much. She thought to herself at the time. Luckily, her summer internship was paid, but her budget was seriously strained by the many nights of bar tabs.

It wasn't the only thing that was strained. In the weeks since they had started drinking, Anna thought that she noticed her friends looking a bit more...soft. It was only something that would be noticed by a roommate-very minimal, but Madison and Cassi in particular seemed to lack their hard abs she was used to seeing when they all worked out together. She had no idea what they weighed, and did not give it much thought, but once in a while, she noticed. One person she never worried about in this respect was Kelsey. She knew that Kelsey's family was thin, and Kelsey was far to in love with her fit/sporty appearance to never put anything on. Whatever, they'll all work it off in the summer. Between the risk of gaining some weight and the money all of them were spending, Anna was increasingly happy that she would be in Dallas on the internship for the summer, earning money, and avoiding parties.


About 5 minutes later, Anna heard a door close, it was Madison, leaving to take a jog around the neighborhood and then through campus. She had kept up her running regine. She wasn't stupid. She knew that this level of partying was not good for her, so she tried to step up her workouts. A jog with the briskly paced Kelsey was always something to look forward to, and with the hot guys in the gym, she didn't mind making trips over there either. Of course, there were limitations. Whenever she was hungover, gym was usually out of the question, instead getting a burrito or something greasy from the cafeteria usually had to suffice, since it made her feel better, and during hangovers, she was in no mood to count calories, but that was only two-three days per week, she reasoned.

While jogging, Madison ran into Kelsey, who was just leaving the gym.

"Going out tonight?" Madison asked.

"You know it. Have to celebrate the end of finals." Kelsey said.

"You've done for a whole day now." Madison was correct in that, Kelsey had one of the better draws, being done on Wednesday morning, at the expense of an earlier study schedule than the rest of them.

"Well, after how much work these were, I think I deserve another night of going out with Powers' preeminent party queen."

"No complaints over here." Madison responded.

After a while, Madison finished her jog. Sweaty and exhausted, she got back to the sorority house and walked past Anna's room again, where she was still studying. She never quits...to have that kind of work ethic. Madison thought as she got into her room. Following a quick shower, Madison, not wearing anything except her towel, saw her scale on the floor. It had not been used in a while, since nothing felt tighter, but know this weekend was going to be one of indulgence, Madison decided it was time for a look.

137.9 was the number that starred her in the face.

...Oh...that's not good. Madison thought, as she looked at it, thinking it was about 4 pounds more than she expected. She looked at her stomach. It was flat, and still the envy of many, but it was indeed softer, and could not longer be considered six-packish. Better watch out for that this summer were her final thoughts on the subject, before trying to decide what to wear that evening.

142 pounds.

As she was eating, Cassi took the chance to look at Madison's stomach, which was visible under the short dress she was wearing. Cassi also took note of Madison's legs. It seemed her drinking demeanor was not the only thing that had changed since Madison became old enough to go out to the bars, as Madison's thighs looked slightly larger and a bit softer. Her skin was still very tan from hours of being outside this summer, and the indulgence was not really too noticeable, however, Cassi realized that she would probably not consider Madison to be 'fit' anymore, as much as average. Kelsey had indulged with fries, notable, because she already had been indulging all week.

He had been enjoying it as well. They shared many mutual interests, from the Powers basketball team (Kelsey being a current student, and Kyle growing up in the area), to crappy reality television (a guilty pleasure for each of them), to even cars (Kelsey had grown up reading her Dad's auto magazines, Kyle worked at a mechanic's garage in high school.) Now, with each of them in deep infatuation, neither was really working out like they would have in a normal summer.

When it got to be later in the evening, she would end up just running to Madison's room to talk about how excited she was about the relationship, or invite Kyle to stay for a movie in her room.

However, this allowed Kelsey to put off actually finding out just how bad it was. 5 pounds...tops she thought to herself.

She had reason to fret, for the past two weeks she knew about the pool party that Kyle had been invited to by one of his friends from high school. Kelsey was not all that concerned about Kyle seeing her in a bikini, he had already seen a lot more than than, but she was concerned about making sure she looked the best in public, especially compared to the other girls that would be there.

Her concern turned into nervousness as she tried on her bikini that afternoon. It was her bikini she had used for the past two years. She got it from one of the trendy stores in town, and although it was not racy, like any bikini, it showed a lot. When she pulled it up, she noticed that she could feel the fabric up against her butt much more closely than she ever had before. More worrisome, the previously mentioned love handles were ever slightly present. When she put the top on, she did not notice it to be much different than she remembered, but her bottom half had definitely gotten a bit bigger. Kelsey was not looking forward to the afternoon.

By the time they drove up to the house, Kelsey was a tad more at ease. It was about 45 minutes from campus, safely in suburbia, clearly one of Kyle's friends parent's house, very typical McMansion, and very large with nearly identical houses sporting manufactured differences. The overly green lawns and landscaping that hugged the curvy, non-grid roads temporarily threw off Kelsey, as it stood in such a difference from the Powers campus. However, when they exited the car and got down to the pool, she immediately felt insecure again.

There were about 10 other guys there and 10 other girls, and all 10 of these girls had bodies that rivaled Kelsey's a month ago. They were gorgeous. It should not have surprised her that her hot boyfriend hung out with these people, heck, Kelsey was one of them too, but she was kind of hoping that he maybe was a nerd who got hot later, so her recent softness would not stand out.

"Is everything okay?" Kyle asked, noticing how stiff his girlfriend seemed.

"Yeah, it's fine." Kelsey said unconvincingly.

"Okay, well, I hope you like everyone, we've all stayed in touch."

They were suddenly interrupted by a girl who hollered from the pool, "KYLE! Is that her?! We want to meet your new girl!!!"

He turned to Kelsey, "trust me, let's go."

They were standing at the top of a hill in the backyard, next to patio furniture that everyone else had put their clothes on, so Kyle removed his shirt. Kelsey noticed something...Kyle had a bit of a belly. It wasn't huge, but it was there...and it was also soft. For someone who had a great six pack when they first started hooking up, she wondered how she had not noticed this. Wishful thinking? Seeing him shirtless from a distance of more than a few feet perhaps? Regardless, he had definitely gained weight as well, and seemed able to roll with it. Even though she was in no way okay with her own gain, he boyfriend's confidence gave Kelsey the push she needed to disrobe and meet the waiting peers.

--------------------------------------------

Madison checked her phone while at her cubicle.

"Anna: Ugh, they are giving us so much food here during lunch."

She texted back,

"Tell me about it. All the middle aged women who work here always seem to bring in food, it's insane."

"Anna: Well, at least we can work it off."

"Let's hope."

Madison didn't know what Anna's weight situation was in the slightest. She was not going to ask, since she suspected someone as image conscious as Anna would be fine, but hers had now reached a point of very serious concern. Her work appropriate skirt was beyond tight. When she sat down, and even when she stood up now, the outline of her stomach was clearly visible, being hung up by the tightness of the fabric. Her button up work blouse also felt tight not only in her stomach, but also the arms, which also alarmed her.

Worse, she just received an email,

"Hi everyone!

Jan brought bagels for everyone in the accounting team! Help yourself!"

Madison knew that she should not, but she was so hungry. She glanced at the clock in the corner of the computer, trying to figure out if she could make it to lunch. --9:47-- She then knew it was not going to happen.

Walking into the kitchenette, she politily greeted a coworker, who had just grabbed an onion bagel.

Man, that butt looks larger than in May he thought to himself, before his mind wandered back to if him or his wife was taking their youngest to soccer practice that evening.

Madison looked over the bagels, and saw the one she wanted. A large cinnamon one, starring back at her. She knew it was not healthy, but she could not resist. She grabbed it, and after brief dilberation, gave in to her momentarily limited self control and grabbed both halves, then proceeded to coat them in cream cheese. After two months in the office, Madison had discovered how much she loved large amounts of cream cheese on her bagels, but always felt guilty, knowing that each one was a calorie bomb.

Later in the day, Madison was walking back to her desk after grabbing some copies. As she sat down, she heard a slight tear.

Oh no. Oh no. Shit! she thought as she paniked and tried to find where the rip was. She knew it was not a total tear, but hoped this was manageable. Madison quickly located it on the right side of her skirt, a burst seam the culprit. She tried to walk to the bathroom, while covering that side of her skirt with her notepad to shield the damage. When she got in, she realized she could conceal it to her coworkers by untucking her blouse.

5:00 could not come fast enough for Madison now. When she got home she raced upstairs and to the scale to see what the damage from her indulgence and sedentary work lifestyle had been. She quickly took off her clothes, and jumped on her scale.

156 pounds.

"WHAT?!" screamed Madison, in deep shock. She knew she gained a lot of weight, but this much?

She looked over her body, and it had dawned on her, she needed to lose this weight if she wanted her senior year to be as planned. Sorority President, hot guys at the formals, being able to own a room when she walked in, all of it hinged on her spending the second half of her summer getting back into shape.

1231111111.content:
Neither of them wanted to mention it, the end of summer was coming, and both Kelsey and Kyle were not ready to part ways. Despite the potential awkwardness of an office romance, neither of them ran into much trouble during the summer at the SAT prep office. They had informed their boss Brad that they were seeing each other, but rather then have any policy against it, he had just responded with a polite, "Well, just don't let it interfere with your tutoring. Remember, these kids and their parents are paying money to take classes from each of you," and that was it.

Now however, the summer romance was coming to an end. Kyle had to go back to school on the east coast, and Kelsey, with only one year left of school, was going back to Powers. Neither of them thought following the other was a good idea, each had already made their class schedules, but they vowed to visit. Over dinner, they made a plan.

"You know, it's only a 2 and a half hour plane ride," Kelsey said, "and you could always come back to visit your parents."

"That's true," Kyle responded, "fall break is right around the corner. Plus, maybe the down time can help me shed some of these pounds." While saying that Kyle, motioned, touching his belly. The fitness freak had gained around 15 pounds over the summer, most of it going to his stomach, as he had enjoyed going to the bars and hitting up restaurants with his girlfriend.

"Really." Kelsey responded, "You're not alone in that"

The past month had been one of expansion for Kelsey. She was especially thankful that the pool party had been in mid July, and not a month later. Since then, she had been indulging even more, as summer bliss had moved to the realization that her and Kyle would have to part ways in a bit. Because of that, she had gained 15 pounds over the course of the month, something she was only recently aware of, after Megan had finally replaced the batteries in her scale. However, on top of the previous weight, her total had come to 150 pounds since Madison's 21st birthday, a gain of 25 pounds on her 5'6 frame, and it was noticeable. Her legs had continued to grow, and she thought that her thighs looked almost chubby at this point. Additionally, her stomach seemed like it was on the verge of being a belly. Her butt had also seen significant growth, and she had already had to buy new size 10 pants, temporary ones, as she told a still-thin Cassi, who had gone shopping with her that day, however, having to move up regardless was still a slap in the face. Kelsey probably was not considered chubby, but this still devastated her to be this size. In an odd way, the only thing keeping her from feeling worse. That and Madison, who had put on a ton of weight this summer.

At the end of the week, her summer job would be finished, Kyle would be back at school, and Anna would be back from Houston. Kelsey had not seen Anna since she left for her summer internship months ago. She was not looking forward to having Anna see her bloated body, especially since she knew the place Anna had been staying was a gym, and she doubted that the image conscious Anna would look any different from the day she left, especially with the heavy workload and non-social summer she had.

12311111111.content:
Madison had originally planned on putting on a skirt with a cute top during that late afternoon to great Anna at the airport, however, as she soon found out, that was going to get a bit more complicated than she had planned.

"Ugh, clooosseee" she said, sucking in her now sizeable gut, trying to get it in the flaps of the skirt. After a few tried she sat on the bed, dejected, letting her gut almost sit in her lap. "Fine." She said out loud, to no one in particular, "I guess it's time to face reality," and followed that up by walking to the scale in the bathroom, unused since July. She nervously disrobed, and expected the worst.

-164.2-

She stood there silently, with the 164 pound reading staring back at her. Oh my god, I've gained 34 pounds since the spring, oh no no no. Madison looked at the mirror, and should could tell. Her muffin top was now rather obvious. Her boobs looked bigger, but also lacked the previous perkiness that she really loved, and considered to be better than her current situation. She looked at her thighs, which had clearly grown, and then moved to her butt, a location of significant deterioration. Even her arms seemed softer than she remembered them being last month, and she wondered how pinched they would look in the sleeves of some of her polo shirts she had not worn for a while.

Screw it, Madison thought, sweats today. The former hottest girl in the class, now on the verge of being considered chubby decided that for at least today, she would be seen at the airport, in sweatpants and her Powers sweatshirt, because dressing nicely did not feel worth it. After she had pulled the sweatshirt over her head, she heard Cassi yell from down the stairs,

"Madison! We're ready, where are you?!"

"Coming!" she said as she sliped a pair of women's boat shoes on, and ran down the three flights of stairs, to the foyer of the sorority house, where the other girls were waiting. She starred at her two other best friends, and took inventory.

Cassi was there, wearing shorts and a Powers-T shirt. Despite working at a bar all summer, it appeared that Cassi had sustained the least weight gain, nothing that could be seen from her eye, leaving her with her great figure to complement her cute face and blonde hair. When Madison turned to Kelsey, the same could not be said about her body. Kelsey had landed somewhere between Madison and Cassi in terms of gain. Kelsey had clearly gained some weight in her legs and belly, but seemed to be pulling it off in well fitting shorts and a nice top.

On the ride to the airport, Madison was the first to touch the subject,

"How quickly until Anna brings up my weight?" she asked. Madison knew that Cassi and Kelsey shared her assumption that Anna kept her perfect figure, given her tendencies for perfection, and her desire to stay fit.

"Stop it, Anna would not do that." Cassi said,

"Besides, you're not the only one who indulged this summer." Kelsey said, "I think we need to worry about girls we are not as close with anyways."

Madison nodded her head silently, she knew Kelsey was right. Just as they had done in previous years, she knew other girls on campus would use any imperfections in a sorority's members against them during recruitment. If we become known as the fat sorority, we're finished she thought to herself while she looked out the window. She also wondered how this would affect her chances of being President of the sorority, but she figured she still had the hold on the 60 other some girls in her chapter to make that happen regardless of what had happened to her figure over the summer.

When they got to the airport, they waited, until they saw Anna...

123111111111.content:
The girls all waited curbside in Cassi's SUV for Anna to emerge from the doors of the baggage claim. They all were expecting her, but had no idea what was about to greet them. They were expecting the 5'9 stick think brunette who weighed around 130.

Eventually she emerged from the doors, and all three girls immediately saw her at the same time, falling into stunned silence as she walked towards the car.

Cassi leaned over to Madison, and quietly said, "Oh my gosh, Anna got chubby."

Madison never would have suspected this, Anna was always the most health conscious of all of them, all she could spit out in response; "Wow, yeah."

They all scanned her body through the windows of the SUV. Her face looked, softer, throwing all of them off guard. Unlike Kelsey's slight pudge, and Madison's gradual gain, this was the first they had seen of her since the spring, and were not used to seeing the start of a double chin forming on her. Her arms had also grown, looking soft. Not huge like that of a 200 pound girl, but clearly soft, in sharp contrast to the sticks that she used to have. It didn't seem like her belly had gained a ton of weight--it was clearly there, with lovehandles on the side to match, but it just wasn't a gut hanging over her shorts. Speaking of which, her shorts showed off the largest extent of her gain. Gone were her toned and slimmed, seeming never ending legs from the spring, now, shaking as she walked towards the car, were pale thunder thighs, soft, and long past the point where she would have a thigh gap.

The girls in the car all wondered how much she gained, the answer, was a whopping 45 pounds in 3 and a half months, an incredible gain.

As she got to the car, she threw her stuff in the trunk, and jumped in.

Madison who was sitting in the back couldn't keep herself from starring at the pale flesh off her thighs that seemed to spread in the rear bench seat.

"So great to see everyone! Thanks so much for picking me up!" Anna said to everyone.

Madison, Kelsey, and Cassi all wondered if they should say something, or just never reference the weight...ever. None of them had the courage to bring it up, or at least before she could drop another bomb on them.

"So, I wanted to keep it a secret until we could properly celebrate..." Anna said, with excitment, "but I can't wait to tell you girls, I GOT A JOB OFFER!!!"

The instinct for the rest of them was to scream with her in excitement.

"OH YAY!! Madison said in response, "Where at?!?!"

"It's going to be in Houston at Williams Energy! They were so impressed with my work, they signed me to begin next spring, after we graduate!"

"We need to celebrate tonight!!!!" Kelsey chimed in.

When they got back, Anna walked into Madison's room.

"Madison, we have a problem....my clothes from the fall...don't really fit anymore."

Madison was not all that shocked, given how tubby Anna looked.

"Oh no! If you haven't noticed, I struggled with that too."

"It's just...they kept ordering in lunch so we could continue to work over lunch, and staying in a hotel...I kind of ordered in most of evenings and just lounged around watching TV. I'm so stupid, I should have never let this happen to myself." Anna said, dejected and sad about her situation.

"Let's make a work out plan this fall! Come on, this isn't us. We can lose the weight," Madison suggested.

"I guess. We have a bigger problem in front of us, our clothes." Anna said.

"Hmm. Maybe we take a quick trip to the mall?" Madison suggested.

"May as well."

As they got to the mall, they noticed that each of them were not particularly excited to be shopping, as opposed to normal. Anna learned that she was now a size 10, and proceeded to buy some skirts that were longer than normal, in addition to some short shorts. In the dressing room, Anna looked at how the shorts reflected on her legs. She knew she was not fat yet, but the line was certainly in sight. She would describe herself as curvy bordering on chubby. She was not used to seeing her legs have this kind of circumference, and she sighed as she saw how soft they were. However, she knew her weight wasn't ideal, but she also wasn't atrocious yet, so she decided to get them and wear them that evening. She also got a shirt that somewhat showed off her softer arms. This disappointed her more, as she used to be so proud of her subtly muscular arms. "Well...." she thought to herself, "maybe I can get some cardigans when fall rolls around to cover these up. Or better, yet, work this fat off."

Anna stepped out of the dressing room as Madison was leaving her's. Madison wardrobe looked similar. She had a bit more of a belly that she was trying to hide in her purchases, and now had shapewear to help her support her new bulges.

As they drove back to campus, Anna turned to Madison, and asked "Hey...we can lose this weight...right?"

Madison sat there quietly, paused, and answered, "Yeah, I think so, I mean....this just isn't us."

Neither of them were thrilled about their situation, and each still felt they were thin girls trapped in curvy girls' bodies.

Maybe they felt that they were thin girls at heart, but others in campus noticed their new curves as they went out to celebrate Anna's job offer, valid once she got her degree at the end of the year.

As they went out, Madison again noticed that Cassi was the only one who had retained her thin figure. Sure, none of them were huge yet, but the rest of them; herself, Kelsey, and Anna, were no longer model thin. Of those three, Kelsey had fared the best, even though she herself did not feel that way. She was wearing dark navy shorts and a summery top that was a bit loose. Even with the looseness, Madison could tell that Kelsey's newfound softness was mainly in her lower half, with a slightly larger, and much less tonned butt, to go along with legs that were no where near as jiggly as Anna's, but still clearly softer and larger than they had previously been.

When they got to the bar, a group of guys they usually hung out with were already at a table near the end of the bar. The one that Anna had been previously pursuing, Aaron, leaned in towards his friend Jeff, and whispered, "Umm...do they look larger?"

Jeff scanned the room and saw the girls walking in, clearly curvier and in Madison and Anna's case, maybe even running the line between curvy and chubby. "Oh dude, yeah, that's not good," he agreed.

They still drank with the girls, but no one went home with many of them, and Cassi seemed to be getting the most attention, with her thin body and still hot,blonde package. Madison could not decide if it was because of her weight, or if guys were just gunshy, but one thing was clear for her, she was going to need to lose the weight to get more action from the hot guys she was used to.

Kelsey was not really in the mood to hook up anyway, she was still looking forward to the occasional weekend with Kyle, however, that did not restrict her from having a good time, and she, like the rest of the group, overindulged on beer again that night.

123111111111112.content:
Madison was fairly confident that she had the support to do this. Heck, didn't most people expect the sorority presidential elections to be a cakewalk for her? Now a senior, Madison had done everything necessary to put herself in the position to be the next President of their sorority. Ever the impressive student, the grades were there. Her outside extra-curriculars, with her past time put in at the student newspaper, and community service, were solid. Plus, she had been one of the most outgoing Juniors last year to the incoming freshman who were initiated, surly that had to mean something. At the moment, she could not even think of anyone who was running against her.

As she got into the chapter room of the sorority house, she was alarmed to see a projector set up with the words shot onto the screen,

"President:
Madison Kraft
Jennifer Stacy"

Jennifer? Madison thought, I didn't even know she was interested in this. This gave Madison some pause, but she was not overly concerned. Jennifer Stacy? Please. What could she edge her on? Jennifer was just a girl Madison considered to be a slut. She never had held another position in the sorority. If there was any reason for Jennifer to be in college, it was to get her "Mrs." Degree. Always a marginal student, Jennifer did not have the natural smarts that Madison did. However, Jennifer did have one new advantage over Madison, she was a knockout.

This would not have been an issue the previous year. As Madison was her equal in that area, each looking hot enough to be models. However, as another girl put it, "Madison just looks so bloated this year." Now, there was no contest, Jenifer was a knockout, Madison had an imperfection.

Jennifer, of course, was willing to exploit this. She always thought Madison looked down on her, and since Ms. Perfect seemed vulnerable, she decided to take from her what every one in the sorority knew she wanted most--the distinction of being sorority President.

Maybe she was not as smart as Madison, but Jennifer knew how to work her angles. Avoiding Madison's friend group in the sorority, she had spent the previous few weeks reaching out to girls who Madison considered friends, pealing away votes, and using less then fair tactics. Jennifer mainly focused on recruiting, using arguments like, "Listen, I hope she loses the weight, but you know how freshmen are. We are going to get the worst class of new pledges ever if we let her represent us. Girls want to get into an elite sorority, and we need an elite sister leading us."

It was an unfair attack, but there was a bit of truth to that, so many members of the sorority were swayed. Madison did not know it, but she had a tough road ahead.

Anna, in her position as the sorority member with with highest GPA from the previous year, chaired the first meeting in the absence of an elected President. Cassi and Kelsey sat in one of the chairs, assuming that Madison still had this thing in the bag.

After speeches, the three of them assumed Madison still was on path the breeze to the Presidency. Madison gave a great speech, talking about specific plans to appeal to new pledges, ways she could raise alumni donations, and her plans to get administration off their backs to avoid probation if things ever got out of hand during parties. Jennifer, on the other hand, gave a disjointed speech, full of vague statements. After it was over, Kelsey leaned over to Cassi and muttered, "I feel bad for Jennifer, Madison is going to crush her after that."

Anna was part of the group of 4 other girls who counted ballots as they came in. As the first few trickled down, and heavily favored Jennifer, Anna thought to herself, "That's weird, these must have been from a pocket of Jennifer's friends." As more and more came in, it became clear to Anna that Madison was going to lose. She could not text Madison to let her know her fate, she just had to go ahead with it. She shot a grim look to Kelsey, who was equally surprised.

"Uh-oh," thought Kelsey, who knew immediately that something was wrong.

As Madison and Jennifer were brought back into the pledge room, Anna announced, "I think we can agree that either of these girls would have been great Presidents." It was a lie, she could not believe the decision she was about to announce. "I hope everyone can congratulate Jennifer on her election as President."

Madison was shocked. She looked over at Anna confused. How could this be? she thought to herself. I courted all those votes last year. How is this possible She congratulated Jennifer, and walked out of the room, to her bedroom. Anna followed her into the hallway.

"What the fuck, Anna?" Madison asked, starting to cry, "how did this happen?"

"I have no idea." Anna said.

"Was it close?" Madison said, prompting Anna to look at the ground, not wanting to lie to her friend if the results go out.

"Umm," Anna said, "No. Not really, she kind of ran away with it."

Madison ran up to her room, but not before grabbing some ice cream to eat while crying. She was humiliated, and could not believe what had just happened to her.

As was typical for a group of college students, it was hard to keep secrets, and it eventually got back to Madison how Jennifer had won. "That bitch," Madison said to one of the Sophomores who told her what Jennifer had said about her. Madison had moved from being sad to angry, but the lingering insecurities about her new body were only further entrenched.

1231111111111121.content:
Kelsey weighed herself after another workout.

159.

Ugh,how is this possible, she thought to herself.

As far she she knew, she was doing enough work to lose some of the pudge she had picked up during the summer. She knew that was not the case, given that her new clothes felt tighter, but she was doing the things that used to work. She jogged and hit the gym, even though those had become major struggles. She was trying to eat right, so what was the X factor that was changing everything? She knew the answer, the drinking. All of the girls had been drinking more than they previously had, now that they were able to go to the bars. As Kelsey looked at her body, she was surprised that her stomach was still somewhat soft, but that most of the it had gone to her butt and thighs, again, she knew that would change if more weight went on--something she was determined to avoid.

While she walked back to the dorm, she saw Anna leaving the library.

"Ugh, how does she do it?" Kelsey thought to herself. Anna had clearly lost around 10 pounds, something that she was proud of. Anna was able to sneak in workouts between classes, stick to a diet that mainly consisted of salads, and when they did drink, which was frequent, she stuck to gin and water. Anna was functioning at an extremely high level, as she was used to, and it was paying off, now that she was already down to 160 on her 5'9 body. This was still unacceptable to Anna, but she was pleased to be going in the right direction.

As she exited the library, Anna spotted Kelsey,

"Hey!" Anna said, seeing the sweaty sorority sister, "how was the workout."

"I don't know...sometimes I wonder if it is all worth the effort."

"Oh shut up," Anna said, "you'll work the weight off, you already look better."

Both Kelsey and Anna knew she was lying. The new weight was clearly evident in Kelsey's lower half.

"How do you get to the gym so often?" Kelsey asked Anna.

"Let's not act like I'm a good roll model here, I still gained all the weight this summer."

"Well...yeah, but."

"Honestly, it's hard. I feel like I'm barely keeping up in class, and the gym has just been a release for me. I enjoy being able to sweat it out after a rough day."

Kelsey wondered how Anna could keep going like that. She knew that Anna put the most time of all of them in at the library. It just seemed like Anna never had any personal time, it was always go, go, go, with her, and she wished she had that kind of drive.

When Anna got back to her dorm room, she saw she had an email from her Mom that read, "Anna, please call me when you get a chance."

Anna was alarmed. It was not like her to be intentionally vague like that. She had no idea what to expect, but she immediately called.

"Mom, it's Anna, is anything wrong?" She asked.

"Anna," from the first line, Anna knew the news would not be good.

"It's your Dad...he got laid off from the company."

Anna gasped. Her parents were very middle class, and although she knew her parents had some put away in savings, she could not imagine it had been much, given how much she had received in financial aide during her time at Powers. She heard her Mom crying on the other end of the line. This was bad. Anna did not really know what to say, so she just asked about the situation,

"Does he, umm, know what he is going to do?" She asked, feeling awful.

"We don't know...we just assumed that his branch was safe, but they closed the whole office," her Mom responded.

The rest of the call did not go much better. After Anna hung up, she started crying. She wondered what her parents were going to do? How would they afford their mortgage? Or their bills? Would she have to drop out to start work and help them out? Anna had no idea what to do. At that moment, she felt hopeless, so she just started crying. After a few minutes, she went to the fridge, and just started eating. It didn't matter what it was, leftovers, snack food, ice cream, Anna cleared out the contents of her fridge. In the moment she didn't care, she just wanted to focus on eating, as opposed to what her parents were going through, and her uncertain future.

Anna decided not to tell any of her friends what happened, since she was embarrassed. However, when Madison greeted her for dinner that evening, Madison noticed how much Anna pilled on her plate. Multiple slices of pizza, and a non-diet soda.

"Tired of salads?" Madison asked, somewhat sheepishly, since her weight had stayed frustratingly present since the start of the year.

"I've had a rough day." the pale brunette said.

"...and now I fell so bad for complaining about my problems to Anna, she's got it wayyy worse right now!" Kesley sighed as she finished explaining the whole story to Kyle. She set her phone back down to grab a bite of her Chinese takeout, in which her intake of has increased in the past few of weeks due to her struggles with classes and making an effort to raise her grade. She needed to study, and this need meant she got hungry more, which showed itself more on her body, something that didn't make Kelsey happy to say the least. She set her container down again and took a look down at her stomach, something that was becoming more prominent with each one of her orders and the new 10 pounds she had aquired, and sighed again at the sight. "Enough about me, how's everything going for you? We haven't talked in such a long time."

Kelsey sprung off the couch (or as fast as a girl who's still adjusting to a now 35 pound gain can) and bolted to the door, throwing it open to see Kyle standing in the frame with a small suitcase and one of the biggest grins someone could have on their face. She threw her arms around him, though when she did she noticed that something felt off. Nevertheless, she cheered, "You're here!"

"Say it a little louder so the whole building can hear you, why don't you," Kyle chuckled as he stepped into the apartment. He placed his suitcase in the corner of the living room and took a look around the room.

She punched him in the shoulder and retorted, "It's hard to do much else when I'm studying, I already told you that!" Kyle laughed at her response then sat down and started eating her current open order.

"Mhmmm, good pick," he told Kelsey while he chewed the chicken. Kelsey sat down with him and finally took in all of Kyle. She was so surprised by him being in her apartment that she hadn't really looked at him until now, and what she saw was not what she would have expected to say the least. As he opened his mouth to put the next bite of chicken in, there was a noticeable double chin forming when he opened his mouth. It wasn't a permanent one yet, but there was no denying his face had put on some weight, and that was certainly not the only area of him to have some added padding. Kyle's stomach resembled a beer gut, not huge but definitely rounded and was slightly beginning to sit on his thighs, another area that had without a doubt expanded. While Kelsey had no room to talk about weight gain considering her figure, she wasn't wrong to be a bit surprised by her boyfriend having looked to gain about the same amount of weight she had in a shorter period of time.

Two years pass... Madison is 30.
124.content:
Madison couldn't believe that tomorrow was her twenty-eighth birthday. She felt as though just yesterday had been her first lecture in Carlton Hall, a bright faced freshman, so eager and full of promise.

The alarm woke her from a wistful dream of lying on the emerald-green quad at Powell, surrounded by warmth and belonging, back when her fantasies and aspirations had teemed with lofty visions of a professional career. These hopes had then blossomed into the search for true love, but her passionate affair with higher education proved to be a day lily, bursting forth with fire like a dwindling star. She thought of the lovely grass, a perfect kelly green, standing in sharp contrast to the red brick footpaths witch traversed it in number, forming a constellation from above. As she brushed the sleep from her eyes, sitting up in bed to undo her hair, these brick walkways brought to mind that bloody dress, how its strappy back of deep ruby red pressed tight against her skin, the goddamned Prada rag that Steven had gone to such trouble to bring back for her from Austria. Why on earth had she promised to wear it for her birthday party? She had gotten that dress months ago. Fashions had changed by now, Madison rationalized. How could she be expected to wear something like that?

Seriously, this was the last thing she wanted to be thinking of right now. On her birthday of all days, truly unbelievable. This was her day. This was Madison day. For once it wasn't Steven day, but still she was thinking about what he wanted, the bloody ungrateful bastard. He expected too much of her.

As the curtains rose on an automatic timer and light streamed into the room, Madison noticed her reflection in the many-mirrored surfaces of the sleekly appointed bedroom. The fact that her glass likeness was the only object not like the others in the room deposited itself discretely into her vast library of denials. Steven, usually only a rumple in the down comforter at this hour, had not even left an imprint last night, the linens still pulled tight. Instead, there was a crystal wine glass laying on its side, above an angry red stain. Madison cursed under her breath. She would have to replace it without Steven noticing. She simply couldn't be bothered by these sorts of things, on today, of all days.

Suddenly roused from her morning fog by the ringing of her phone on the bedside table, Madison felt a wave of comfort and reassurance pass over her, to see Cassi's familiar face flash onto the diamond-crisp display. Cassi would make everything right, just like she always had, for practically as long as Madison could remember. She had always been her most loyal friend, confidant, and sorority sister. They had stuck together like glue all through their time at Powell and even afterwards, Cassi finding work in retail, and Madison as a secretary for a law firm downtown. Cassi hadn't shared in Madison's "luck" in finding a rich man such as Steven. She was still a working girl, a single, but relatively prosperous regional director for a mid-level clothing chain by now, with an office at corporate out in the Midwest. Madison could never admit it, but deep down, she was jealous of her best friend's independence and success. Cassi made good on her own. Had Madison chosen the easy route like so many others? She always felt a strange breaking feeling deep inside of herself to see Cassi’s frequent postings of exotic vacation photos on FaceTab. Steven took her for a week in Cabo on their honeymoon. She remembered him getting so drunk onetime he shat the bed. Madison had not been far out of the suburbs since. She let the phone ring.

Motion sensing lights flicked on, as Madison stepped into the master bathroom. Her feet were cold, until the heated floor was finished warming. She had become an expert at performing her morning toilet routine without ever catching a glance of her own reflection. Like a vampire only to herself, she did not appear in mirrors or photographs. If she had examined her appearance on this particular day, she would doubtless recall a number of things, not the least of which being that it was clearly evident her weight was becoming a serious problem. Madison would have surely noticed that her face appeared puffy and had an almost swollen quality. Her beautiful features had become buried under a thick layer of fat, like the mad impression of an over-zealous pottery sculptor, massing on ever more clay, the product of her endless pattern of overeating, and not to mention frequent over consumption of alcohol. A corpulent roll of chin fat, visible from every angle, had replaced Madison’s neck. With her thick black mane of hair, well puffed up from a tumultuous night’s sleep, reaching down to her well-padded shoulders, Madison would definitely have then been astounded by what had become of her pert young breasts. They had ballooned to an impressive size, but at the expense of their once pleasant perkiness, hanging a bit lower than Madison probably would have liked. Luckily for her, she now had a thick spare tire of a gut that her heavy boobs could rest on, giving her over-taxed back some much needed respite. Madison’s bulging belly hung low and did a nifty disappearing trick on her lacey underwear that probably should have been replaced about 15 pounds earlier. From profile, her ample paunch extended several inches past her bust and transferred to far thicker hips at her sides, which often popped buttons and always fought a losing battle with elastic waistbands. She had know idea what she weighed, but the last time she dared to peek at a scale, the number had been 227, but that was months ago now.

Stepping into the steamy stream of the multi-head shower, Madison began to clean her growing body with a fluffy pink loofah, as she loathed to feel the spongey quality of her fat flesh. It was becoming harder for her to get to every deepening nook and cranny of her form. Spending nearly half an hour under the almost painfully hot water of the shower. She used this time to meditate on the day ahead, to calm her obsessive mind by coming to terms with her day’s responsibilities. Madison could reasonably count this as a fairly stress-free day. All she really had on her to-do list was her birthday party later in the evening. Beside that, the entire rest of her time could be devoted to getting good and plastered, surely to be followed by a lot of greasy takeout.

1241.content:
Madison looked up from the crumpled remains of a couple of Big Macs, her favorite drunken meal, and glanced at the clock in the center console of the brand new white Mercedes CLK AMG. Yikes! She had let the time get away from her at the bar of a chain restaurant. Although, it was known more for its pancakes than it's Long Island iced teas, Madison preferred drinking there because she knew that she would never run into any acquaintances. She had few friends these days and had become a bit of a recluse, her out of control weight being a large blow to her once shining self-confidence and bubbly personality. When she did interact, it was usually with some of Steven's cadre of yuppie friends, or as they liked to be called, "young professionals."

Grabbing a fry from between the crease of her constantly touching thighs and popping it into her mouth, Madison put her spaceship-like vehicle hastily into reverse. She was really hoping to wait out and soak up her buzz with fatty food. But damn, it had gotten so late.

She was taking a major risk by driving in her still drunken state, but as is so often the case, the alcohol still very active in her system impaired her judgment. Madison struggled to keep things in her path from cloning themselves in her vision.

As the saying goes, “everybody get’s one,” and Madison got hers in not being pulled over on her way home from Mcdonalds. Stumbling through the entryway, she did not expect to see Steven, who chastised her for making them late for the party.

Ridiculous, she thought, the nerve of that foul man, especially hating how the veins in his forehead popped out when he was angry. She found it grotesque how they continued up his shiny scalp, ravaged it was by male pattern baldness.

He had been handsome once, but now he seemed like an ogre to Madison. She wasn’t sure whether it was his aged appearance that caused her to look at Steven differently, or if her more learned experience with his dysfunctional personality painted him in a more dubious light. This wasn’t what she had signed up for, but then again, events had transpired which Steven had cause for grievance with as well.

From Steven’s point of view, Madison, his beautiful and voluptuous young Latino wife had turned into a total pig before his very eyes. Sure, she had a fair amount of junk in the trunk, by the time they met, and he had seen old photos of when she had really blown up in college, but she had to be even larger than that now. Madison had an even bigger beer gut than that fat fuck Larry from accounting.

The woman he had married was practically a health nut. Steven had been more than happy to pay for her thrice-weekly Bikram yoga classes and expensive Nike running gear. He had even paid for a fitness room to be added onto his already spacious 3-bedroom six-bath house in a great neighborhood. Now he had lost 15 pounds and was running up to 6 miles daily, training for a marathon, while Madison’s elliptical machine gathered dust in the corner.

She used to be a vegetarian, only drinking biologically diverse white wine with meals, but now he had decided to turn a blind eye to the astronomical bar tabs on her visa. Steven figured he might as well own a fast food restaurant for the level of those receipts alone.

Under the guise of becoming a wine connoisseur, he had allowed Madison to sign up for a mail order “Distinct Wine List” subscription. Stains everywhere now, two new sofas.

Steven found her appearance to be disheartening. While he disliked yelling at her, he had always had a bit of a temper and it made him distressed to see her this way, clearly drunk, with smeared make up, standing in the hall with her pants unbuttoned. Her fucking stomach was literally oozing out of the too-small trousers. He could see her ass from the front. The t-shirt, sporting a fashionable Chanel logo, hardly recognizable across the chest, was hardly much better. She had fifteen minutes, and that was final.

Upstairs, in the master bedroom closet, Madison scrolled through her clothing hung on a powered rack. There it was, the fateful Prada dress, the dreaded rag. She didn’t even think it was pretty anymore.

What was the big deal about Prada anyway? They had to seriously get over themselves. All these yuppies were so materialistic, only concerned with conspicuous consumption, keeping up with the Jones’. Madison seriously considered not even attempting to put on the clearly under-sized garment. Deep down, though, she knew she had to.

Standing before a full-length mirror, forced to confront her countenance for aid in navigating the red cocktail dress up the treacherous slopes of her stout frame, Madison struggle to pull the haute couture past her fat thighs. The dress had refused to move past a point barely above her dimpled knees. Frustrated beyond all belief, Madison gave one final tug, and that was when she heard the first horrid sound of ripping fabric.

“Fuck it, she thought.” This damned thing was going on anyways, rips, or no rips, but as she would find, definitely rips. With the first tear allowing for the dress to come up to her butt, Madison now struggled to pull it over her lumpy rear. Finally it went, but at the expense of a rip in the hindquarters, exposing her pink panties and jiggly cheeks.

Next was the belly, or the Battle of the Bulge, as one might call it. Madison was really having a hard time fitting the front-piece over her huge gut. The dress zipped up the sides and was strapless with an open back, she was simply too wide for it, but damned if she didn’t try her best.

She broke both the zippers and burst into tears, running down the stairs to find that Steven had left without her, on her fucking 28th birthday.
