choices: Erica's next date
Emily erupts towards her family
1413311211222111111112212222211211111122.content:
With Power’s success at the state academic competition behind her Madison had another issue to deal with. Video of the contests, rebroadcast on cable tv, had been viewable in Florida. Of course Madison had already confided the truth to her Dad, at least to some degree; she had also forewarned her concerned mom.

But now there was no more room for hinting. The television camera even tends to add a few pounds. Both her family and friends now knew just how porcine the formerly svelte brunette had become -- and her mom wasn’t happy.

‘What is it with that school? From what I could see on television most of your entire team were made up of overweight students.”

“Mom,” protested Madison,” is that really all you saw? We were on television for winning, not because of our waistlines! And yes, Powers does have a heavier than average student body. But the education quality gives us a hiring record upon graduation in the top 10% of the nation. Doesn’t that count for anything?”

“Well, I suppose,’ said her mom hesitantly, “but how do your classmates feel about becoming such porkers? Not everyone can be as lucky as you and take up with an heir to a fortune.”

“Now cut that out!” protested Madison. “I’ve already had to deal with the gold-digger issue with his family and I don’t need it from my own. I found out about his family fortune the same way Dad did – from researching after we were already involved. But about my classmates I can give you some stories that you might not believe.”

“Like what?” her mm replied.

“There is a new freshman,” Madison related, “who came here as flat bellied as you could want. But she enjoys eating so much that her stuffed tummy looked like a food baby when she was finished – until it wore out the next day. At least at first. But she came to enjoy the buffet breakfasts, great lunches and of course the dinners that the students make themselves. Gradually her food baby became not just overnight but more like all the time.

“After a few months her entire waist began forming what is called a muffin top. Her waistband started slipping down and her top began riding up so that her belly was showing – she had to start wearing an over blouse to keep it from being exposed. So what do you think happed?”

“I would hope she woke up to what was happening and started on a diet,” exclaimed her mom.

“Nope. Just the opposite,” Madison declared. “At the beginning, when she’d grab a snack or have desserts she’d make jokes around the dorm about keeping her food baby happy. Her weight gain attracted the attention of one of the guys who likes bigger girls and he gave her a box of cookies for the food baby. They’ve been steady for four months now and she’s into her second wardrobe change. She’s still pampering her food baby and he’s great with it.”

“You mean they’re deliberately getting her fatter? What on earth for?” protested her mom.

“I guess she felt repressed and is now letting it all out – who knows?” replied Madison. “But she’s only unusual for declaring it so openly.”

“That school sounds like hog heaven! I don’t know how I let your father talk me into going along with that scholarship offer,” her mom sputtered

“I understand his thinking. No one wants to spend $60,000 for an education if they can get it for nothing. But you’re right about the food policy here – Michelle Obama and her food Nazi army would be appalled. The student meal program is incredible in both taste and calories – and it shows. But mom, we’re happy and have a future. Shouldn’t those be important things?” queried Madison

“Surely not everyone there wants to be a heifer I would hope,” countered her mom.

“No, although I wouldn’t call any of us heifers. We basically just want the freedom to be ourselves and that isn’t a dress size or a number on a chart. But you’re right,” Madison acknowledged, thinking of Erica. “One girl wrote a snide letter to the Proclaimer, our school paper, but then she backed off and apologized after others took an opposing view.

“That same girl after we won the tournament, was with several of us when we celebrated the next day with a breakfast of southwestern quiche.”

“What’s that?” asked Mrs. Kraft.

“Eggs, flour, three kinds of cheese, mushrooms, bell peppers, olives, picante sauce, flour and half and half, all baked in a piecrust – you should try cooking it,” suggested Madison.”Its completely meatless, although quiches can have beef, chicken or sausage if you want. The recipe’s on the internet.”

“Mixing half and half with eggs and cheese is going to have a gazillion calories,” observed her mom. “Is that what they teach there – high calorie cooking?”

Madison laughed. “Not really – I’ve been learning to cook using the Internet. But this is a very pro-size school, no doubt about it. The student center meals have both salads and the high calorie entrees – its our choice.”

“Well, I think you know that electing high calorie choices isn’t my view,” mumbled her mom.

“And I understand that. It wasn’t mine at first. It’s been a real paradigm shift,” acknowledged Madison. “But now you have a large economy size daughter who is too happy and too busy to be anything different than what feels right for her. Its really not that bad, Mom.””

“I guess I need to think about this,” her mom conceded. “You know that I love you.”

“Yes, and know that I love you too,” said Madison as she hung up the phone.

With her mom off the phone she looked out the window and sighed, her hand absent mindedly running over the supple flesh of her inner thigh. It was soft and spongy, definitely fat, but she did not feel repulsed.

She remembered how fully rounded her upper arms looked in the mirror that morning, not to mention her upper torso. This image must have indeed surprised her mom but Madison was already comfortable with these features. Instead her mind began thinking of the frozen éclairs and ice cream she knew lay waiting in the freezer, not to mention the package of oatmeal and raisin cookies in the pantry. .

Madison shrugged. The éclairs could wait. She knew it would take time for her mom to accept her choice, but Madison was comfortable within her body. She could give her mom space to adapt; for now it was time to finish a report – then raid the kitchen before retiring.

As for Erica she had enjoyed the breakfast - plus grazing twice in addition to her other meals for the day.Her mom actually seemed to favor Erica's zestfully helping herself to a second helping of meat loaf and potatoes that evening - her menus had definitely become more varied. And as far as she could tell it wasn't yet having any noticeable effect except to increase Erica's enjoyment of food now that she was no longer treating it as an enemy.

Erica was aware, of course, that she had been eating more and things could change. But this didn't seem to matter. She was edging closer to going along with Susan's "c est la Vive" attitude about her weight. Why,she wondered as she lay in her bedroom finished off an evening bowl of ice cream with strawberry topping, couldn't her sister Emily accept this?

Emily was sitting at her family's dinner table, watching her family eat and chatter. She couldn't bring herself to say anything because all she could do was stare at how nonchalant her family had become over food, and namely her sister's weight gain. Ever since Erica joined the academic competition team she had slowly become accustomed to their ways of eating whatever and not caring about the consequences, in this case the consequences being the now permanent bulge sitting in her lap. It irked Emily beyond belief that Erica would let herself get like this, and that her parents would be following suit! Even they had put on a few pounds, her dad's shirt straining at the buttons and her mom's pudge spilling out of her sweater some. Emily simply couldn't take it anymore.

"Why are you doing this to yourselves?!" She finally yelled as she banged on the table. Everyone abruptly stopped eating and talking and just stared at Emily.

"Why do you not seem to care about health anymore! You let Erica eat whatever and hang out with that group of fatties and you even have started eating like that too! It's not attractive and I don't want to have to be associated with that image!" she yelled.

"I'm really sorry you feel that way, honey. I know that the change is hard, but different people are made for different lifestyles. We've simply realized that ours needs to be more relaxed and less rigid. If you want to keep a stricter diet than you may, just like Erica has chosen to follow a more loose diet. You're both adults, it's up to you," replied her mom. Her dad nodded.

"We aren't going to push you to be or eat any which way, that's your choice. However, maybe loosening up a bit won't kill you, you are in very good shape after all. A little wiggle room won't hurt you," said her dad.

"I can't believe you're doing this; you're defending your new eating habits like this! You're all going to become fat if you keep this up, I promise you," declared Emily. She looked around the table and noticed that Erica was staring down at her rounded stomach, crying over the comments from her sister, and then ran away from the table. Her parents watched this unfold and turned angrily back to Emily.

"Emily, this behavior is now unacceptable! There are now two things you have to do: one, apologize to your sister for those comments. Two, you are grounded for a month, but not in the traditional sense. Your grounding will consist of you following your sister's diet for a month so you understand exactly how those comments made her feel," her dad declared.

"But what happened to me being an adult and making my own choices? This doesn't sound like that!" Emily fought back.

"That was before you devastated your sister. Now, whatever she eats, you eat. You are going to essentially spend a month in her shoes so you don't make this mistake again."

"I hate you, Erica, god I hate you," Emily muttered as she attempted to button her jeans. For two weeks she's had to eat all the same things as Erica, and Erica was not going easy on her, eating worse than usual just to torture her sister the way her sister had tortured her about her new eating habits. Every day It felt like the two were eating an entire grocery store, and it was showing on both of them.

Emily was displaying everything she hated now. She had weighed herself before getting dressed and was up 15 pounds in 2 weeks, all of it going to her stomach. By no means was she even close to chubby, but she had a belly protruding from her body. It was killing Emily, she was only 2 weeks in and still had 2 more weeks to go, and who knows what those would do to her body. This brought Erica some joy, to know that her sister would finally get a taste of her own medicine.

Because Emily was having to eat everything Erica ate, Erica was showing results of the extreme overindulgence as well. While she had only put on about 25 pounds before her sister's punishment, she had put on another 20 from eating constantly with Emily (considering she had a head start on her weight and her metabolism had slowed more, she gained more from the same amount of food). The bulge that set Emily off in the first place was now a proper gut, growing wider and taking up a good portion of her lap when she sat and shaking whenever she moved. The rest of her just got softer, her legs jiggling a bit more than they used to and her face looking less angular. Her overall appearance sent her into chubby territory officially, meaning her thin girl days would be long behind her by the time Emily's punishment was over.

Their parents would cook whatever Erica wanted them to as a part of the punishment for Emily, and that meant Erica was choosing the most calorie-laden dishes she possibly could to leave an impact on her sister, but because it was for the family her parents were showing the effects a little bit as well. The sliver of pudge her mom had before had grown into more of a muffin top, love handles hanging over the waistband of her jeans more than just a couple inches. Her dad's buttons were beginning to strain two weeks ago on his work shirts but now he's almost at the point where he has to replace his shirts because the gaps between the buttons are simply growing too big. Her parents were enjoying food before, but Erica's approach to her sister's punishment was causing them to adjust more to this extreme diet, something that would be hard to shake once it's all over.

Erica was already downstairs and shoveling food into her mouth when Emily made her way down. Emily was barely able to get her jeans closed, which was evident when she sat down and her stomach formed two small bulges where the jeans dug into her stomach. Erica saw how uncomfortable Emily was and couldn't help but smile a bit.

"I chose today for us to eat stuffed French toast. It's filled with a cream cheese frosting and topped with maple syrup. Sounds good, right?" she said to Emily. Emily grunted and shot her sister a dirty look as she began to eat her heavy breakfast. Emily had to admit that it tasted good, but she was struggling to finish it considering how heavy it was. But, because she had to, she was able to finish the 2 large pieces she was presented (although it was a while after Erica finished hers). By this point it was already 11 AM, which meant Emily only had an hour and a half to recover from her first rich meal of the day, which was her new pattern on Saturdays and Sundays. Emily looked down at her now bloated stomach, something she was ashamed to say that she was getting accustomed to seeing on her.

"EMILY, WAKE UP!" Emily's jolted up in bed at the sound of someone yelling in her ear, looking over and seeing her sister standing right next to her bed with a grin on her face. "It's the last day of the month!" She said as she skipped out of her sister's room to make her way down to the kitchen to help her mom finish putting together the last day's meals. Emily got herself out of bed and groggily made her way into the bathroom to get ready for the day. She had a cheerleading competition that day so she put on her cheerleading uniform, it feeling very different than she was used to. She took a look in the mirror and examined all the changes since the last time she donned the uniform. And it was quite a different image.

For starters, where she once had abs were now replaced with a fairly sizable roll of fat that was made worse by her having squeezed it into her cheer uniform, causing it to squish out of the crop-top style top. It was a miracle that she had even gotten her skirt on that day considering how much her rear had grown. Once it was flat, but now it jutted out and made her skirt much more risque to compete in since it barely covered her butt. Everywhere else had just some minor changes, her thighs wobbled more than before as their gap was shrinking and her face just looked less angular, more smoothed over than before. She stared at it all, wondering how much damage had actually been done, so it was time to break out the scale. Last time she weighed herself 2 weeks ago she was up 15 pounds, bringing her in at 130 pounds, but there was no question that number had gone up even more since Erica had added even more food into their day which was quite a feat considering how much she had them eating before. She stepped on and was shocked to see the number as high as it was. 155. Erica had managed to get another 25 pounds on her in just 2 short weeks somehow.

Emily sighed and made her way downstairs to see what she would be eating for breakfast that day. She was surprised to see that it was just a simple stack of pancakes and some fruit and nothing more elaborate.

"This is it?" Emily asked her mom and sister. They both nodded.

"I decided to be nice today, you have a competition and it would probably be hard to do all of the acrobatics if you're weighed down by a bunch of food," Erica told her sister, patting her belly for emphasis. Erica's belly had grown even more since the last time. She had decided two weeks ago to start adding weight gain powder to all the food she gave her sister, forgetting that everyone in her family would be eating most of it too, including herself. But it was okay because now she would always have something to stick it to her sister. She was surprised Emily hadn't said anything this morning when her belly was about to hit her in the face, she must have been too tired to notice. The 30 pounds she put on made her look like she was about to enter her third trimester it was so round, but it was obvious that it was a food baby with the way it jiggled every time she moved. She also discovered a couple days before that she was officially obese at at 180, but she was saving that zinger to use on another day.

"Ah, yes, because that hasn't mattered every other time I've cheered this month, and when I got moved to the bottom of the pyramid last week..."

"Emily, please don't complain at the table. Your sister is trying to be supportive of your competition today, so maybe just be slightly grateful," said her mom. Her mom took a bite of her own pancakes and as she chewed Emily and Erica could see how this experiment (for Erica) and punishment (for Emily) had impacted her. She now officially looked like a chubby mom, the 40 pounds she had put on over the course of the month having settled in a lumpy kind of way, just making her look kind of squishy.

"Save some food for me!" their dad called out as he made his was down the stairs. He was the last one down since he was having trouble finding a shirt that would fit. Much like Erica, his weight went primarily to his belly, causing him lots of wardrobe problems lately with him having popped several shirt buttons just the other day. He had even been to his doctor for a checkup that week and his doctor told him he needed to lose weight since he was now considered obese at 245 pounds, having gained 45 pounds that month alone from Erica's meal planning (and powder). But he wasn't planning on not enjoying all the food he was given, so obese he would be... and his family would all probably be joining him too. He sat down at the island in their kitchen but couldn't get as close to the counter as he needed to not spill his food since his belly formed a barrier between them.

"How's everyone doing this morning?" He asked his family. "Ready to cheer on our cheerleader?"

"The question is whether I can even cheer at this point, I'm so big I was told last week that if I put on any more weight I won't have a spot on the team anymore," Emily said. Her parents looked at her with a bit of concern now, realizing that maybe this experimental punishment had gone a bit too far.

"Well, honey, don't worry about it. You'll be fine today, and I think you've learned your lesson, so this is the last one of these meals you have to eat," said her mom. Emily jumped up and started cheering.

"Thankyouthankyouthankyou! I promise I won't say that kind of stuff again," Emily said. She ran back upstairs to try and figure out her game plan to lose the weight, but as she looked in the mirror (mainly examining her nice, round bubble but) she realized that maybe having a few extra curves wouldn't be the worst thing in the world.

"So, what happened to trying to 'drop the weight?' We told you that you wouldn't have a spot on the team if you put on anymore weight and instead you've put on another 15 pounds in a month! There's no way we can have someone who looks like you on the team," the captain of the cheer quad told Emily in the locker room. She started to cry as she emptied her locker. She had tried to lose weight after the month of eating like Erica, at first managing to drop a couple pounds, but since the rest of her family had decided to continue eating a more high calorie diet her efforts proved to be null since she couldn't counter the calories with nearly enough exercise to even maintain her weight, forget losing any. She took her bag and left the school to go home, not wanting to deal with anyone for a while as she mourned the loss of her school status.

She walked into her house and was greeted by the sight of her sister and her boyfriend on the couch.

"Hi, Emily! We're just watching some TV, want to join?" Erica offered, not noticing her sister crying.

"I'd rather not," Emily said, looking at her sister and remembering how it's her fault that she had been kicked off in the first place. Were it not for Erica's choice to not care about her weight (evident by the over 200 pounds of Erica on the couch), Emily would still be a cheerleader and her family wouldn't all be fat. She glared at her sister's massive stomach, which now sat on her lap and had begun to get wider instead of just resting in front of her. Every other part of her seemed small in comparison to her stomach, and it seemed to be even affecting her boyfriend Gary, who had a bit of a belly the entire time Emily had known him (which wasn't long), but now looked much larger, probably having gained about 35 pounds from the past 2 months with Erica once they started getting serious (Emily didn't know of course that he was part of the reason Erica had gained weight in the first place, but that's besides the point now). Emily huffed her way upstairs, threw her stuff on her bed, and went into her bathroom to see exactly what wasn't right about her for the cheer team.

Emily would never admit it, but it was a miracle the cheer team had kept her until she was 170 pounds and hadn't cut her sooner.

"Emily, I really need you to clean your room. If these peanut butter jars sit open for much longer, we're going to wind up with a rodent problem in the house," Emily's mom told her visibly depressed daughter.

"I'll do it, just leave me alone," replied Emily. It had been 3 weeks since Emily had been kicked off the cheerleading squad, and she had yet to recover from the emotional blow of her favorite activity being ripped away from her and it showed. All the time she had once filled with being active through cheerleading was now filled with the consumption of food, leading to her blowing up in size in just a few short weeks.

"Honey, I know it still seems hard now, but you can find another activity to do. Cheerleading isn't the only thing in the world."

"But there's nothing I can do in this shape!" she cried out, lifting and dropping her ever-growing belly for emphasis.

"Well maybe try to find a non-physical activity like your sister did, or if you really want cheerleading back then you can try to get back down to your old weight. Also, dinner is going to be in 10 minutes" her mom replied. Emily just huffed and turned away from her mom. Her mom gave her a concerned look but decided that it would be best to leave her alone for now.

Emily turned over and stood up to take a look at herself in her mirror, and she barely recognized the person staring back at her. She thought she was large before, but the additional 34 pounds she had gained since quitting cheerleading made her look as if she swallowed the old version of herself. Now standing at 204 pounds, she had a belly that constantly muffin topped no matter what she wore, even in sweatpants. When she left cheerleading, her legs had begun to alter her walk, but now she was more waddle than walk with how large they had gotten. Gone was the slender face that she used to have, now home to a permanent double chin and chubby cheeks. The girl in the mirror looked as if she had never worked out a day in her life; like she had always been a fat girl, and this bothered Emily.

"It's all my family's fault," she said to herself in the mirror, still blaming her ever-growing parents and sister for putting her in this position. Never in her life did she think she would have an obese BMI, but here she was. As she made her way down the stairs to go to dinner (since it took her and her family a little while now to get situated at the table), she realized that she was still at least in better shape than her parents and sister when she saw them at the table.

"It's about time you got down here, I was about to start eating without you!" Erica exclaimed, something she said almost every night now. If Emily had thought Erica was out of shape three months ago with just an additional 25 pounds, then there are no words for what she looked like now. Between the way the house now ate and how her boyfriend encouraged her to eat, Erica had to be closing in on 250 pounds. It was obvious her stomach was still her largest asset, filling all the space that surrounded her in her chair. Everything else seemed small in comparison, but still quite large compared to.. well... anyone. She was a constant vacuum for food, and it didn't seem like she was slowing down any time soon.

Her parents weren't much better. Her mom looked like she had been inflated, just looking extremely puffy all over (if one could look puffy at 228 pounds without a bit of sagging). Her dad still had a beach ball gut, usually his belly entering a room now before he did. The rest of him seemed to have taken the last 46 pounds, making his movement much more labored as he neared 300 pounds. Compared to these three, Emily was still thin. But as she ate her meal with them, she realized she didn't want to get anywhere close to their sizes. She helped clean up dinner and went back to her room. She took another long look in her mirror and examined her quivering body again.

"I need to start changing this right now," she said to herself with an affirmative tone and began cleaning up with peanut butter jars, vowing to make a change in her appearance starting now.

1413311211222111111112212222211211111122.content:
"WHAT?!" Emily screamed as she stepped off of the scale. "How did I only lose 4 pounds in a month? I can't still be over 200!"

After that fateful dinner, Emily had created for herself a very regimented diet and exercise plan so she could try and lose some of the weight (she decided that she liked how she looked with a few extra pounds, so she planned to lose all but 20 pounds, making her goal weight 140). However, a month into her regiment the results were not showing up as fast as she had hoped.

Emily looked at herself in the mirror, hoping that maybe the 4 pounds she had lost that month maybe showed some kind of change on her body, but there was nothing, and that was in part because of how hard it was for her to exercise based on how the weight settled on her body.

Her legs were still her largest feature, with enough weight having accumulated on her thighs that she waddled instead of walked, which made the runs she tried to take every day especially hard and the squats more difficult (her calves had even plumped up, a sign that the weight has definitely settled and will be very hard to come off). Her stomach was a definite paunch, but Emily just kept remembering that it at least wasn't as bad as her sister's. Her face kept its roundness, the double chin being unable to be hidden and the chubby cheeks still looking as if they had food in them (these elements of which Emily would later find out would still stick around even after she lost weight). Everything about her just looked puffy, and she wanted that to stop. But only 4 pounds in a month discouraged her, so she went downstairs to try and get a healthy snack.

"Mom, where are the apples I asked you to get?" Emily asked as she rummaged around in the fridge, searching for her healthy snacks she kept stashed away. Everything she moved was junk, junk, and more junk food, not finding any of the food she kept in the fridge anywhere.

"I forgot to get them, honey! I'm sorry, make sure they're on the list for when I go tomorrow to the store," her mom muffled as she crunched some potato chips at the counter. While Emily had been making efforts to eat healthy, the rest of her family had moved even further in the opposite direction. Looking at her mom, she realized that if she hadn't known that was her mom she wouldn't have even recognized her. Before, she was definitely one of the rare, thinner moms, even with her shorter stature (about 5'3). But now with an additional 85 pounds on her, she had a belly that hung and sloped forward almost like an apron, hips that flared so far out it's shocking she didn't get stuck in anything, and just like the rest of her family, a round chin thank hung down with chubby cheeks.

Emily just shook her head thinking about that, then responded to her mom, "Okay, just please remember to get then next time, you forgot last week as well." She ultimately grabbed a granola bar and made her way to the living room to watch some TV. She didn't though, because when she got there she was met with the sight of her sister and her boyfriend making out on the couch. Emily wrinkled her nose at the sight. The couch was creaking under both their weights, considering Erica just seemed to be ballooning at this point. A month ago she was almost 250 pounds, now she was easily 275 or more, with most of it centered in her midsection. When she sat, her stomach pooled around her, sitting dangerously close to her knees even. When you looked at her face, her cheeks had puffed up so much that when she smiled her eyes turned into a squint, being obstructed by the amount of fat in her face. And her boyfriend was no exception either. The first time Emily met him he may have had a slight belly, as it seems many college guys do after too much beer, but now it seemed like he too was puffing up all over, having to have put on easily over 50 pounds since dating her. Emily looked at them in disgust and kept making her way upstairs, disappointed in everyone around her and the fact that she wasn't losing weight as quickly as she wanted.

She went into her room and flopped backwards on the bed with a sigh, trying to figure out how on earth she would lose the weight with people like that around her. She sat like that for a while until she heard a knock on her door.

"It's Dad, can I come in?" he asked.

"Fine," Emily replied, and in came her father. Or rather, in came her father's belly and then her actual father. He seemed to be growing just as rapidly as her sister, if not somehow even faster than her. While Emily had eventually realized that his weight gain began months ago, the fact that he had put on about 140 pounds in less than a year seemed shocking to her. Just like her sister, he his weight was concentrated in his stomach, making him look like a walking yoga ball, with his belly somehow not having given into gravity yet and still looking perky. His arms stuck out from his sides even due to both the fat they picked up and how round his midsection was. Every part of him was round at this point, and Emily just didn't understand why he let himself get like that when he once had been the spitting image of men's health.

Emily's dad had waddled his way over to her bed while she was thinking all of this and sat down next to her, the bed letting out a loud creaking noise to remind them that it wasn't built to hold over 500 pounds on it. Both ignored the sound and he put an arm around her (or as close as his large body would let him).

"So I hear you didn't meet your goal for the month," he said to Emily. She nodded.

"I just don't understand why I didn't! I've been following my meal plan, I've been exercising every day, but I only went down 4 pounds in a month! That's a pound a week."

"Well, something doctors have told me over the years is that it' much easier to gain weight than to lose it, so it'l just take some time for it to happen. But luckily you're young, your metabolism is still adjusting, so you can fix it much more easily than I can now," he laughed as he shook his belly, sending his whole body jiggling from just the small movement.

"I guess you're right. I just need to accept that it'll take some time," Emily said, sounding deflated.

"Hey, don't stress it. If it's meant to happen, it'll happen. Maybe this is just your body's way of saying it likes where it is. That's what mine did when I attempted to lose some weight almost a year ago, when I had only put on about 25 pounds, and that's when I realized that I wasn't supposed to be the slim guy forever."

"Yeah, but I don't think it was telling you to be the 320 pound guy either," Emily retorted. Her dad let out a loud laugh.

"You're right, but I sure do like it at this size!" He exclaimed as he rocked back and forth to stand up. He walked out of the room, leaving Emily with a lot to think about.

What if he's right, she thought. What if I'm not supposed to lose the weight? I guess there's only one way to find out!

That phrase had become Ryan's parting words to Tim almost every day for the past two months as chugging soda had become one of his methods for putting on more weight quickly, and his roommate found the method weird.

But it, paired with some other strategies, was highly effective on Tim's body.

Tim, after winter break, started planning his school meals more, creating almost a schedule. In the morning he makes himself a milkshake with a few scoops of weight gain powder and eats two high calorie breakfast burritos. At lunch, he eats in the dining hall but makes sure to eat a minimum of three plates of food plus dessert. Dinner he does the same thing. For snacks, he eats a large bag of chips in the morning, cookies in the afternoon, and a pint of ice cream in the evening. He took a supplement that also helped slow his metabolism down more (not that it needed much help slowing, it was practically nonexistent now). Oh, and he drinks a liter of soda a day. All of this has greatly helped him grow.

He was already up to a total gain of 60 pounds by the time winter break was over (240 pounds), but his new eating habits added 38 pounds in January (putting him at 278) and he was about to find out how much more had come onto him in the month of February. He stepped onto his new scale and waited for the number to be read out to him (he figured with the way the weight settled on him it would be hard to read a scale so he found one that would say the number out loud).

"313," the scale read aloud. Tim grinned at that, knowing he got 35 pounds in the shortest month of the year, 133 total since the start of college.

He examined himself in the mirror, examining all the changes that were happening faster and faster now. His stomach has resembled a basketball at the beginning of winter break, but now was more of a beach ball from the weight settling mostly there. When he looked down, all he saw was his bulbous stomach, the floor was barely visible around the round mass of fat sticking out from his midsection. But the other changes he could see in the mirror quite clearly. The face that looked back at him was encased in fat, with a massive double chin and a third one already starting and cheeks always looking as if he had something stuffed in them. His legs had swollen up to give him a waddle now. Even his forearms and hands had swollen up, his whole body really looking like it was stuffed into a sausage casing. He was unrecognizable even from just a couple months ago, and he was loving the feeling.

She meant no ill will towards her younger sister, but Alexa being the baby of the family had always been more adored than the elder child. She was just enjoying the fact that little miss perfect had an imperfection for the first time.

Alexa’s tummy continued to be a focal feature, maintaining to grow faster than her clothes allowed. The chubby Kraft daughter stood there awkwardly, awaiting her sisters arrival. Madison might have been smirking at her sisters physique, but her parents were having the opposite reaction watching their oldest daughter walk towards them.

Madison had grown very bottom heavy, and her hips had started to flare out at her sides. Her legs had thicked tremendously, and left her thigh gap nowhere to be seen. Of course the rest of her had also gotten some extra padding, making her look much softer then when she left home at the beginning of the semester.

“Mom! Dad! Alexa!” She shouted, as she gave them all hugs, giving them the full softer experience. “Thank you so much for picking me up, I have so much to tell you.” Which started a whole semester recap that continued until they all got home.
15213212121.title: Her whole family, parents and her sister

choices: Madison helps Alexa make bad choices
Alexa drags Madison to her appointment
Madison gives Tim a call
152132121211.content:
Once home, Madison’s mother and father excused themselves, as they were happy their daughter was home, but already needed a break, and more likely time to process what had happened to their typically slim daughter. Madison started rifling through the kitchen cupboards as soon she had put her things down. “God there is nothing to eat here.” Madison whined. “How do you live like this?” She asked her sister. Madison had become accustomed to meals on demand, and snacks ready to eat. “Wanna hit McDonalds with me?” Madison proposed.

“Maddie, how can you be hungry already, we just got home?” Alexa asked, trying to be kind about her sisters weight adjustment.

“What else is there to do around here? And it’s not like they served us anything on the plane. Now come on I’m starving.” Alexa agreed to go along, telling herself that she was just looking out for her sisters best interest, maybe she could encourage her to eat one of their healthy options. It seemed as though Alexa was getting ahead of herself, because as soon as they both walked inside, getting a whiff of the greasy fast food and seeing the bevy of menu items, Alexa had thrown her plan right out the window.
They each carried a tray, bustling with food over to a nearby table, each of them ordering at least three meals, and a couple of sides. Like two hungry hyenas they dug into their food, reminding Alexa of her week at Powers. Madison seemed to be enjoying herself, taking a moment to express her joy to her sister. “OMG we need to do this like every day this vacation, this is sooo good!” Madison gushed.

Madison’s comment made a switch click in Alexa’s mind. What was she doing? Why was she eating so much? Wasn’t she concerned about how much weight she was gaining? Alexa had been having these thoughts for weeks, but had found little willpower to stop whenever presented with an opportunity to eat, especially something delicious. At least in her moment of clarity she was able to pass on a warning to her sister. “Actually mom and I have been concerned about a little weight gain that I’ve had, so I’m going to see the doctor this week. Maybe you should make an appointment too, just to get checked out?” Alexa ended her statement with a recommendation.

But all Madison heard was that her perfect little sister was being meticulously cared for, and would soon lose those extra pounds, and go back to being perfect again. Madison was not excited for that future, so she decided to do whatever she could to keep her sister for picking up healthy habits. “Oh you really think a doctor is going to be able to tell you why you’ve gained a few pounds? All the girls I go to school with have gained a few pounds, its natural this time of year, especially at Powers. It’s getting cold out, and no one is going out as much as they used to. Also it’s the holiday season, time for Halloween candy, Thanksgiving turkey, and Christmas cookies. So you might pack on a few, as soon as the holidays are over, I'm sure they will all melt away, they always do. You might as well enjoy it while the season is here, rather than be miserable.”

Madison made a valid argument, well almost valid. A few pounds would surely be nothing to fret over, but 50 pounds was encroaching on a problem. Alexa wanted to keep her appointment, but wanted to take what Madison said into consideration as well.
152132121211.title: Hungry Madison goes hunting for food

choices: They go in to eat. Counts as exercise, right?
They hit the drive thru, and Alexa is done eating by the time they get home.
They are surprised by free cone day. Free cone each time they go in line!
1521321212112.content:
Alexa had convinced her older sister to give her a ride to her doctor's appointment the following day. It was the younger sisters sneaky way of getting the chunky Madison to hear the hard truth about their not so innocent recent weight gain. They walked in, Madison distracted on her phone, as she wasn’t very interested in being her sister's chauffeur. She would much rather have been home on the couch watching Christmas specials on TV.

But Alexa had a winning smile, and she did love her sister after all, even if she didn’t like the idea of her perfect little sister trimming down one bit. Maybe she could use the information she gained here to her benefit. This momentary thought made her smile, as she sat in the sterile waiting room chair waiting for Alexa’s name to be called.

After a few minutes a nice nurse was calling them in, putting them in a room, where again they waited. This time not very long, as just a moment later the doctor was knocking his way into the room, introducing himself. Alexa sat atop the exam table, while Madison still had her eyes glued to her phone in one of the corner chairs.

“Alexa, it’s nice to see you again.” The aging physician had a hearty deep voice. Both girls had been seeing Dr. Morgan since they were kids, and his deep voice had always calmed them during their visits. “Looks like you’ve gained a little weight since you were last in eh?” He read from the chart ahead of his bespectacled eyes. The nurse had taken Alexa’s height and weight in the room when they first arrived.

“That’s what I wanted to talk with you about Dr. Morgan. I’m not sure what it’s from, I’ve been trying to watch what I eat, but my appetite has never been this bad before. Is this normal?” Alexa asked.

“Well 40 pounds in a year is certainly not normal, but for someone your size is not the end of the world by a long shot. You’ve got plenty of time to turn things around.” Little did he know those 40 pounds were just from the last month alone. “Tell me, what is a normal meal for you girls.” He gave a side eye to Madison, knowing she could benefit from this information as well. She was looking bigger than he remembered her being, both girls used to be extremely thin.

“Well when I visited Madison at school, we typically ate two full plates of dinner, and then a plate of dessert.” Trying to get Madison’s attention, involving her in the conversation, but it did not seem to be working as she was still blocking her face with her phone.

“Alright Alexa, this is what I think you should do. Girls your age should only be having one plate during meal time. And trying to limit sweets should help too. I also think you should try and work in some exercise each day. How does that sound? Reasonable? I think with someone of your age and weight, you’ll be back to your old self in no time.” He said with a smile.

“Madison, did you hear that?” Alexa asked her older sister.

Madison waved her off. “Yeah, yeah, sounds good.” She said, not taking a break from her phone.

The good doctor thanked them for coming in, wished them a good day, and said he would see them for a check up next year. Rushing to get back to the car, Madison yanked Alexa out of there as fast as her chubby legs would allow her. Once they were in the safety of their mom’s car Madison started pushing her stomach’s agenda. “Hey wanna hit Micky Dees on the way home?” She asked her sister eagerly.

“Did you hear nothing in there? We can’t be eating poorly anymore if we want to get our…” Alexa stopped herself, as she knew her sister was clearly in denial about her weight. “I mean, if I want to get my figure back.”

“That’s what you got from that?!” Madison sounded baffled. “Alexa” Her older sister said sternly. “He said your current weight wasn’t the end of the world. He also said as long as you stuck to one plate you’d be fine. McDonald’s serves meat, dairy, vegetables, and grains. Those are like most of the food groups right there. Come on! Anyways I already ordered you the same meal from yesterday on the app, so we pretty much have no choice.” Madison admitted as she turned the key and revved the engine alive.

Alexa wanted to continue to protest, but the idea of McDonald’s sounded pretty appetizing. Following her stomach, like she had done ever since she returned home from her trip to Powers, she relented and started to salivate as the got closer and closer to the restaurant.

153.content:
Alison was excited to start her freshman year at Powers. However, she did think it was odd that they were doing some new program where certain freshman would be rooming with Sophomores. Some assistant dean somewhere probably wanted to try something new and get credit if it took off, she supposed.

There was no lack of success in high school for Alison. She was a varsity tennis player and on homecoming court, and she had the body for it. She was thin, about 125 pounds of lean muscle on her 5'9 frame. She had black hair, and a cute diamond shaped face. Getting boys was never an issue for her. She was generally friendly, and she didn't have any trouble landing boys. Being from a small town, she was happy about getting to Powers and hoped to move to a larger city after obtaining her degree.

Alison looked at her placement card again, and saw that she was rooming with Madison Kraft. They had friended each other on facebook before the year started, and Madison seemed friendly enough. One of the things that Alison immediately noticed was that Madison was quite chubby in her photos. Alison went back and saw that the weight was exclusively gained during her freshman year. ''Uh-oh, I have to watch myself, I would want that to happen to me,'' she thought as she packed up her things.

One of the perks of the program was that she got a larger dorm room than most freshman would have. They had a bedroom, living room, and a kitchen, pretty good accommodations now, and unheard of 20 years ago. Plus, she figured the central campus location would be great for partying.

As Alison was unpacking her things the door opened up, and Madison came in,

''Hey nice to finally meet you in person,'' Madison said. Madison looked at Alison, she seemed even skinnier in person. Madison remembered when she had a body like that, but as they talked, Madison realized that Alison was really nice, wanted to have a good time, and that they were going to get along well
153.title: Madison's Sophomore Year

choices: Liz meets Cassi
Liz meets Alison
Introduce a third freshman to the story
1531.content:
Liz was in the same situation that Alison was. She wasn't thrilled about it, however. She wanted to get a freshman roommate so she could meet new friends. This was on top of her not being all that crazy about Powers to begin with. Powers, despite being a very good school, was her safety school. She had been shocked when she got rejected to the ivys that her two sisters each had gotten into. Now, as the youngest and third child in the family she felt like the black sheep. Both her Mom and Dad were prominent attorneys. Her Dad had gone to Powers for undergrad, and urged Liz to apply there, even though he didn't seem to talk about his alma mater much growing up, and seemed more please about the tier 1 law school he had gone to.

Liz grew up rich, but always seemingly falling up short to the success her older sister would have in anything, sports, grades, boyfriends, and her Mom would make that brutally clear through underhanded comments.

One thing that her Mom was not above was criticizing her weight. Oh, not explicitly of course, but in hardly subtle ways. In 10th grade, Liz grew quite the potbelly, that was where her weight had a tendency to pile up, and her Mom actually photo shopped it in their Christmas card. At the time, Liz's potbelly caused her to have pretty large boobs as well, and some fleshy arms, and a little double chin, she was quite topheavy. However, over the course of the next year she worked out and dieted, in no small part because of her mother, and she dropped the weight and enjoyed her senior year as a skinny chick. She was cute, not hot, and had black hair, but was quite pale. Liz had some success in high school socially, but was certainly not the bombshell hottie that somewhat like Madison had been.
1531.title: Meet Cassi's roommate
