1552.content:
Madison wrestled with the food display, part of her craving Mexican food, another cautioning the need for discipline. Starting to yield to temptation she asked an attendant what was in the burritos.

“You have a choice of chicken steak or Chorizo for the meat. We mix it with mushrooms, baby spinach, poblano peppers avocado and a spicy white cheese called queso blanco. Its accompanied by rice and beans with guacamole and sour cream optional,” gushed the attendant. “Personally I love it.”

Madison looked at he attendant, whose full belly pushed her aporn out.

“It certainly agrees with you,” she thought. But still the craving lingered and she gave in.

“OK – I’ve worked out hard today. I guess its OK to try one,” she replied, “and a sarge diet soda.”

“Excellent choice,” replied the attendant, “you won’t be sorry.”

The burrito filled the plate, with side bowls of rice and beans. Madison went to the table where her new friends Kelly and Cassie were seated with their salads. Both were surprised at her meal but initially said nothing, but Madison picked up on their thoughts.

“I know, I know. It’s a calorie bomb. But I’ve been starving myself for a week and just couldn’t resist,” she said after her third bite. “And frankly I’m not sorry.”

“Oh its ok,” replied Cassi. “You’re as thin as a rail compared to me. I kind of wish I could have had a burrito as well. Maybe tomorrow I will.”

“Look,” agreed Kelly, “we’re all adults here to learn. I’m scared to have a meal that big but that doesn’t mean you two can’t have something if you want. We’re just getting to be friends and shouldn’t be making each other feel guilty over such things. That’s so high school!”

With that assurance Madison relaxed and finished her meal. It was very filling and she felt stuffed but comfortable. She went home, watched a situation comedy and had worked on her homework for an hour when Cassi came into her room with a bowl of popcorn.

“Here,” Cassi offered. “I was starving after that salad to match Kelly, and made this to compensate but there’s more than I could handle. Would you like some? I have some root beer to go with it”

“Ummm, sure,” Madison replied. She knew she shouldn’t have room but for some resdion was thrsty. Within a half hour both popcorn and root beer were gone.

The next morning Madison got on the scale, curious to see the damage. There wasn’t any – she was still 128 pounds, actully a pound less than the prior weekend.

“That’s good – proves it pays to exercise,” she thought, and went down to breakfast.

The Powers meal plan Madison was on allowed two free dining hall meals a day of anything you wanted. Up until now Madison had usually had a bowl of cereal with some fruit for breakfast, although many other things were available. Cassie was on another plan and had to pay. This morning she’d decided to let it be her meal for the day, skipping lunch, and suggested Madison try one of the oversized muffins with an omelette and grapes.

“Why not,” she said to herself. “with exercising and my metabolism it can’t hurt – and I can skip lunch as well.”

That day Madison tried to repeat her workout of the day before. It had been over eight hours since breakfast and she’d skipped lunch, which meant she curtailed her effort compared to the day before and headed with Cassi for the dining hall.

“I’m having Italian tonight,” Cassi announced. “Tuesday is lasagna with spumoni ice cream available for dessert and I’m going to enjoy it.”

“And why not me too?” thought Madison, glad to be able to eat a big meal without judgment. The lasagna came with a side of asparagus and pita bread. Kelli wasn’t around but both girls enjoyed every bite plus the generous triple scoop dessert which followed.

“I’m going to have to watch it,” Madison observed to herself as she went home. “ I couldn’t exercise as much today because I skipped lunch and had no energy.”

And so the next day, despite another good sized breakfast, Madison did have a tuna sandwich and soda for lunch. This gave her he stamina to work out fully and she felt she was back on track – and could handle in good conscience the chickem fried steak and mashed potatoes that was the evening’s special entrée, along with coconut cream pie for dessert.

Thursday night she knew would be a pizza fest in the dorm, so she used her meal ticket at lunch for a tamale and enchilada plate. And she worked out before having four pieces of pizza and two of chicken along with two sodas Thursday night, about half of what Kelli had, but nothing was said. Still, the next morning, the scale showed no change. What Madison did not realize was that she was expanding her stomach capacity and improving her appetite.

This pattern kept up for the next two weeks – eating more freely but not in her mind extremely, exercising and keeping her eye on the scale with no discernible effects, But then one of her instructors mandated study teams which cut into two of her workouts – and of course someone brought chips and sods for the meetings. It probably wasn’t more than 500 calories twice a week – but her energy output was cut by at least a thousand as well. But by then Madison was too busy to be checking the scale. Had she done so she would have found that by her second full month at college she’d gained a barely noticeable five pounds.

By his time she was eating and partying on the weekends. Ron Westlin in particular had taken note of her appetite and took her to dinner as well as plying her with snacks at parties. Cassie meanwhile was not on the two meal a day dining hall plan like Madison. She had taken to keeping a pastry stash on hand so that she could skip breakfast – and would share items from it with Madison in the evening two-three times a week. Madison enjoyed the maple bars, bear claws and eclairs and never turned one down.

By the end of the third month Madison noticed her clothes getting snug and got on the scale – which this time read 138 pounds. She was up a dress size and faced with the possibility of dieting. But both Ron and Cassi told her it was not that noticeable and she should just take it easy over the holidays.

She wrote a worried email to her mom, admitting she’d gain ten pounds and wondering how she would react. She didn’t expect her mom, who was a tad plump herself, to be overly upset but still she wondered. Weight discussions hadn’t been typical table talk in the Kraft household. The reply was reassuring.

“Darling, you’re there at Powers to prepare for a career, not competing to be a runway model. Your guy and roommate have it right. With less activity and your focus on grades, as it should be, a few pounds are to expected. I’ll send you a check for a better fitting wardrobe and let you concentrate on your schoolwork,” e-mailed her mom.

As promised the check arrived two days later. Relieved, Madison bought some new clothes and elaxed, determined o uust cut ck so she wouldn’t gain any more.

But of course that didn’t happen. She’d formed a new cycle of normal eating. Breakfasts were typical. Pancakes with eggs for breakfast one day, French toast another, corned beef hash with scrambled eggs another, even enchilada casseroles were among the succulent dishes that enticed her in the Powers dining hall each morning. A burger and shake with Ron at noon followed by an entrée with dessert in the evening and even less exercise during holiday break were also mixed in. Madison avoided the scale, inwardly knowing what was happening but choosing to be in denial.

She declared to herself that she still looked fine, which was true if you didn’t mind flared hips, noticeable belly pooch, soft arms and growing thighs. She carried the new pounds but there was no doubt that Madison Kraft was no longer svelte. Her belly was even with her ribcage, not concave, when standing and gathered into a small roll when seated. Her formerly angular chin was fleshy, although not yet sporting a second section. A thin layer of back fat was forming on her rib cage.

Cassie’s snack habits were no deterrent. In addition to the pastry supply she had chips and other snack foods on hand, particularly popcorn, which she insisted on sharing with Madison. Her weight was climbing as well and it seemed as if she liked having company. By March Madison was up to 150 and ready for another wardrobe upgrade.

“Freshman 15 plus seven.” she grimaced. “Shouldn’t I be hating it? But I really don’t. I’m 5’7” and this is just barely overweight for my height. Its not really that bad, but guess I’ll need to ask mom for some more clothes money.”
1552.title: Madison chooses to try to school food

choices: The don't see each other over the summer, Ron finds a larger Madison in the fall
Madison's summer in Miami
15521.content:
Madison got some more money from her Mom and went clothes shopping, while she was there, she noticed she was up to a size 8. A year ago, still in high school it would have been more problematic. As she got to college, Madison started to move out of the high school chain stores that sold short jean skirts and too tight tanks for $95, towards more young adult oriented stores. She found their clothes to make her feel more intelligent and respectable. Sure, she still was going to get her 'slut' outfit, as she called it, for her occasional crazy night out, or fraternity party, but more and more Madison found herself going for adult clothes. Chinos, respectable, yet trendy tops, shorts that she could pull off at the bars and an afternoon at the country club. The wardrobe change was somewhat standard for most girls transitioning into adulthood, however, for Madison it allowed to make an excuse to show less skin.

The lack of skin was something Madison could not hide when spring break came. She was extremely nervous, especially because she was nowhere near as fit as she was in previous years, when wearing a bikini was a point of pride. When the girls from her floor, and a group of guys including Ron went down to Mexico for spring break, she did not know what to expect. The girls made 'Spring Break xoxo!' tank tops, and it was Madison's hope that those would provide her mid-section with cover while she drank light beer with the rest of their crew. However, after a while, Madison noticed that her body did not seem that bad in comparison.

Sure, Madison had gained a few more pounds since she weighed herself at 150, but her body looked mostly the same. What had changed was the girls around her from other schools at the beach. Yes, outside of Cassi, who had put on a significant amount of weight, the rest of the Powers girls were still stick thin, but she looked around, many of these college girls seemed chubby, if not downright plump. This was in sharp contrast to what she was used to in Miami, where it felt like no one ate anything and everyone was thin. It was reassuring the Madison that her 150 pound body was close to normal here at their party beach in Mexico, and this caused her to indulge, taking full advantage of the lowered drinking age and abundance of beach food. What Madison had not noticed in this situation was that they were the young ones. Most of the girls on spring break were juniors or seniors, and had reached comparable bodies over 4 years, not one, and if Madison didn't change her current trajectory, she was going to get far bigger than them.

After spring break was over, it was time for Madison to calm down and study. Even though no one would say she didn't enjoy herself over the year, she had still kept good grades, and with some challenging classes starring her down, Madison hit the books, staying inside and trying to get the highest grades possible.

This however, did not come at the expense of food. Madison would often get pizza to go from the dinning hall, or order in. Her planned exercise regimen fell victim to the studying as well. "I can always work it off this summer," thought Madison. Between the meals and snacking, Madison continue to do harm to her figure through the spring. There was an upside to all of this though, after it was all over, Madison felt like she had done exceedingly well on her finals, and later in the summer, her high marks would confirm that.

With all the studying, Madison's grades were not the only thing that were high, and on one of the final nights before she left for her summer break in Miami, Madison was finally forced to confront her weight. Her and Ron were going to go out for a final dinner before the year was over. As Ron was waiting outside of Madison's dorm room, he heard her sounding very distressed.

"Ughhhhhh, come on!!!!" He heard Madison grunt from outside the door.

"Need any help, can I come in?" he asked.

"No. Actually, I think we should cancel." Madison responded, on the brink of tears.

"What?" Ron responded, entering the dorm room to a shocked Madison.

"Ron?! I said I want to cancel. Ron would see why. Madison was in her panties, which looked excessively tight. She had been trying, with not a ton of luck, to close the pants she had bought a few months ago, when she was 150. If Madison had previously been on a the fuller side of thin, she now looked chubby. Her thighs had seen a significant amount of growth, and now touched for most of the way down to her knee. Ron could see that they loooked softer than he previously remembered. She now had a belly that stuck out slightly, and love handles to go with it. Even if she could have been able to get the pants to go up, Ron suspected she would have had a muffintop. Madison's arms looked softer still, and he noticed that when she smiled, a previously absent double chin was starting to form. Ron didn't have to worry about the smiling part at the moment, though, because Madison looked like she wanted to cry. She was up to 167 pounds.

"Ron, I'm getting fat. Look at me." she said, throwing her unbuttonable pants to the ground.

"Don't worry, you can always work it off." he said, trying to comfort her.

"No, stop it. No one is going to want to date me. I look horrible."

Ron found his opening and walked up to her, "No, you don't" he said, gently touching her face, "Besides, I kind of like it."

Madison could not decide if Ron was being truthful or just trying to make her feel better. Either way, she did not care, and smiled. Even thought she wanted to lose the weight, and was planning on a heavy workout in the summer, Ron was making her feel better.

There was no dinner that night, but neither of them ended up leaving the room until the following morning.
15521.title: Ron likes the new Madison and lets her know it

choices: Ron picks up Madison at the airport and they go out to dinner
Something else
155212.content:
Ron knew it would be 10 weeks until he saw Madison again. He would have liked to taken her to an elaborate dinner but their night together was for both of them great – they’d even ordered in some pizza. The memory was burned into his mind. Sure, she’d gained some weight but he knew he’d enabled a good part of it and liked the results.

All during their relationship he’d taken her out dining to a better restaurant such Cheesecake Factory and Olive Garden at least once a month. He’d also joined her for “study” lunches that seemed to focus in studying the latest edible novelties in the Powers dining hall – there always seemed to something. He’d also introduced her to a variety of fast food emporiums as part of off campus weekend excursions. Madison had come to know all about McDonald’s double jalapeno burgers, Hardee’s Texas BBQ Thick burgers, Arby’s roast beef and cheddar burgers and smokehouse brisket sandwiches, and IHOP’s Burrito and pancake breakfast combo, among others.

Madison had changed in her first college year and he couldn't help but wonder what would occur when she returned home. Madison wondered as well, but the fact was that she wasn't of a mind to give up her new interest in food and wasn’t really upset at the results. She went along with Cassie’s philosophy that eventually she would find a balance between her base metabolism and her food intake – but hadn’t really done the math to figure it out. Had she done so she would have discovered the balance point to be well over 200 pounds.

Back in Florida her parents were initially wondering as well. They were expecting a larger Madison because of her emails and decided ahead of time to keep a discreet silence. Despite the anticipation they were still a bit surprised at her 40 pound plus expansion but were pleased with her grades and concerned mostly about her happiness.

Mrs Kraft initially served the same kind o breakfast Madison had previously consumed – toast, fruit and cereal. Madison accepted it but inwardly felt deprived. It was far less than she had become used to. Her mom could tell it wasn’t enough and asked her for suggestions,

“We eat more at Powers,” Madison stated factually. An omelet with hash browns would be nice, or maybe an enchilada casserole. I’ve become quite the gourmet at college – as you can tell. It’s a great way to keep up your energy for studies.”

Her Mom felt her daughter was asserting herself as a test, and decided to play along.

“Well, if its what you’re used to I’ll try and be more creative. You seem to actually enjoy having gained so much weight,” she remarked

“Well, I do need to slow down the pace perhaps, but yeah. I’ve gotten used to being a big girl and Ron like it so why not?” she answered.

Her friends from high school were initially shocked at how much she’d ballooned, but since she obviously was happy hesitated to confront her. Madison then introduced them to some of her favorite treats and they came to accept her change, even sharing some meals.

The result? After 10 weeks Madison had picked up 12 more pounds, much to Ron’s delight when she confessed to it in an email.
155212.title: Madison's summer in Miami

choices: Madison actually looses a few pounds, before something changes her routine.
Something else
1552121.content:
When Ron picked Madison up from the airport, he saw Madison in clothes that actually fit her pretty well, "Those must be a new pair of jeans," he thought to himself, and indeed they were. Madison's Mom took her shopping for almost an entire new wardrobe before she sent her back to Miami. For Madison, these were another in a long line of "line in the sand" moment for her on her weight gain. With each high number, she told herself that each new weight gain enabling point was it before she would start trying to plateau her weight gain. Now, with fitting clothes for her 179 pound body, she was doing nothing but enabling herself to become comfortable with her habits, and outgrow another wardrobe.

Ron could see that the extra weight was there though, even if she wasn't bulging from her recently purchased threads. Her face was finally starting to take a bit more of the weight on, and her sharp features were now dulling, giving her more of a cute face, with that double chin slowly making an appearance as more and more weight piled on. He wondered how much more weight it would take for it to be permanently there, 30, 40 pounds perhaps?

He got out of the car to great her, "Welcome back!" Ron said with genuine enthusiasm,

"I missed you so much!" Madison replied, running up for a hug and a kiss. When they hugged, Ron could feel her softer backside, and concluded that not much exercising had been done in Miami over the summer.

On the drive back to the house they were renting, Madison and Ron decided to grab the dinner they were unable to sneak in before summer break had began.

Now that they were sophomores, the option of living off campus was now open to them. They decided to rent a house near campus with Cassi, since that arrangement had worked out well the previous year. With Madison's parent's wealth still having it's perks, by the time she got to the house, she saw that all her stuff had already been moved in, as expected. "They came by last week, Ron explained as Madison saw her bedroom already set up.

Ron knew that Madison would be wearing a new dress that night, mainly because he suspected that her old ones would not fit. It excited him to see what she would come up with. He enjoyed watching his girlfriend try to find new ways to make her body look good as her weight rose, and he wondered what kind of dress she would go with, imagining the skin tight cocktail dresses of old were most definitely out of the picture.

When Madison met Ron downstairs, she was wearing a yellow dress that attempted to hide her weight gain, with not total success. It was a yellow dress with small straps. Her larger bust was evident, and he could see that she was probably wearing shapeware around her midsection--despite that, the outline of her tummy could still be seen. The cut of her dress broke almost at the knee, far longer than what she used to wear back when she was a 4, yet another concession to her larger legs.

That night they went to one of the best resturants in town, and Ron took note of how Madison didn't think twice about finishing her whole steak, and then wanting to get ice cream on the way home. As they arrived back at the house, Madison noted to Ron,

"I'm so stuffed, but I think I'll probably try to work out a bit tomorrow."

"You look great, Madison! You dazzled at the restaurant tonight." he replied.

"Yeah, but I don't want to have to go and buy new clothes again. Plus, I should probably watch my weight anyways."

As she walked inside, Ron was left wondering how committed Madison would be to this effort.
1552121.title: Ron picks up Madison at the airport and they go...

choices: the snacking worsens
a couple weeks later
1553.content:
Madison thought to herself " A salad would be good for now and that I want more I can always grab a small snack or stop at the store later". As she walked over to the display she noticed a greasy pepperoni pizza had just been placed its delicious aroma wafting into the air. Madison paused slightly taking the smell in before being interrupted by the lunch attendant.

"You ready to order?" impatiently said the attendant "Do you want a salad or not". Madison looked at the attendant who clearly had not eaten a salad in years. "Yes please" despite the attendants rude behavior Madison had always been taught to be polite and courteous.

Madison grabbed a water and finished her order, looking down at her food she noticed how small and petite it looked. She suddenly was wishing she had grabbed a slice of pizza or maybe even two.

Madison walked over to Cassie and Kelly taking a seat next to Cassie. "Hey girls" "Hey Madison" they said in unison "How was your workout" as the girls noticed that Madison was still a bit sweaty from her workout.

"It was great thought I am wishing I got a bit more nut have to watch those calories right?" replied Madison. "I know the feeling I swear I put on a couple pounds even if I have a small container of ice cream" sighed Cassie who was lightly nibbling on her salad.

"Hey" said Kelly " We shouldn't have to all feel so guilty about wanting a filling meal we can indulge a little we are all working out fairly often no need to have a crappy salad for every meal". The two other girls nodded and decided that they shouldn't feel bad if they indulge every once in awhile and they won't judge each other if they do.

After the meal Madison was back at the dorm still feeling hungry from lunch and thinking about Kelly's words. Why scolding she grab something to ea if she is still hungry she shouldn't have to starve herself! Madison decided that she was going to stop at the store and grab a few snacks. When she came home Cassie was home and surprised at the amount of bags that Madison had brought inside.

Helping her with the bags Cassie noticed Lays, Pringles and other junk foods in the bag. "Looks like someone went to the store on a empty stomach" smirked Cassie. "I don't know what came over me Cassie it all looked so good and I never could have them back at home so I figured I could try a few.." blushed Madison. "No need to explain yourself just pass the ice cream I think we deserve a movie night!"

That Night Madison and Cassie finished off the half gallon of ice cream. Feeling stuffed Madison felt assured that her workout and salad would mitigate any damage done tonight not knowing that she had not accounted for how many calories were actually in the container....
1553.title: Eats well at first but starts snacking

info.brief_description: Madison is starting college and many new experiences, but some may expand her waistline.
info.description:
Madison is starting her freshamn semester at Powers University, a medium sized midwestern school. This story is about her 4 year college experience, and also how she adapts to her changing weight and social consequences.

The main characters starting off are-

Madison Kraft- Madison is a half hispanic from Miami that is moving to the midwest to attend college. She is excited to get started with the year. She is from a well off family and has a younger sister. She stands 5'7, and initially weighs 130 pounds. She has dark brown hair, tan skin, c cup size, and is attractive.

Cassi Mitchel- Madison's roommate who becomes good friends with her. She is from a tiny town in Kansas. She has blonde hair, and is a little shorter than Madison.

Please add chapters and characters. This is my first story, so please, create a string of chapters and put your own spin on the story. Or message me if you want to see it go a certain direction.
